story:
Our vision is to reimagine the way we all spend time cooking.  As a working wife and mother of five,  I understand first hand the challenges faced with time management and taking care of a family! With this self-cleaning and energy-efficient oven, every cooking experience will be transformed. Now you can flavor, cook, bake, reheat, and steam without even having to be in the kitchen! We are confident that we are on the cutting edge of a revolutionary way of cooking!

Joining The Spice Oven community allows you special access to our mobile app. The technology connected with the Spice Oven is advanced, yet easy enough for everyday use. Through our mobile app capabilities, Spice Oven offers notifications when food is ready, suggested shopping lists, calorie counts, and much more!

We've done so much, and we've come so far but we still need your backing to help us bring Spice Oven into every kitchen!

 

WHAT IS THE SPICE OVEN?


 

The Spice Oven is a smart oven that has a sleek finish and high-quality construction with intuitive digital controls that you can easily use to program the smart oven - regardless of the recipe. The stainless-steel outer panels are safe to the touch while the triple-layer glass oven door allows one to see what’s cooking. The interior light also allows for easy viewing as meals are being prepared. The automatic infusers, that use a patented technology and come inbuilt into the oven, simplify and automate the spicing of meats making the cooking process more enjoyable and fulfilling! 

 

 

HOW IT WORKS

By pairing The Spice Oven to the supported app, you can remotely control The Spice Oven's temperature, settings, time, date and see the progress of the food cooking inside of it. Also, you can set up notifications that will notify you of the remaining cook time as well as send out notifications and alerts to your phone when the food is done and ready to eat! The spice oven app also allows you to select multiple flavor profiles, purchase spice packets and create daily, weekly, or monthly menu options, provide suggested grocery lists, track calories, and count carbs.

Not only does the Spice Oven serve a function- but it also serves a purpose!

  • Meal Prep
  • Meal planning
  • Cook
  • Flavor
  • Bake
  • Steam
  • Self-cleaning
  • Automatic Infusers 
  • Digital controls

Are you still feeling conflicted on what to cook with your Spice Oven? There are many recipe recommendations on the site and through the app that will guide you in making memorable meals for you and your family. The website also links to an exclusive community of Spice Oven Enthusiasts with many recommendations and tips to share.

You'll be able to make a steak that’s juicy on the inside and perfectly crusted on the outside, with broccoli that's firm yet fully cooked with little to no preparation times.

With this amount of control, you can create your own combination of cooking methods to execute your own dishes to perfection, all with one device-The Spice Oven!

 

SPICE IT UP TONIGHT, WITH THE SPICE OVEN APP!

 

 

The Spice Oven was made to deliver a powerful performance that lets you create everything from steamed veggies and roasted chicken to your favorite cupcakes and chocolate chip cookies. Our Spice Oven circulates warm air for even heating, flavorful cooking, and results that speak for themselves (guaranteed!). Best of all, our oven is a great, space-saving option for all kitchens-no matter how small.


Explore! Experiment! Create!

Making meatballs has never been easier! Add ground meat to our Spice Oven meatball pan and let the oven wow you! Let our patented injectors fill your meatballs with mozzarella, cheddar, marinara sauce, or simply spice it up with one of our other spice packets.

 Add a little spice! And eat well!

In addition to our wide range of spice packet options, add jalapeño cheddar to your favorites list! With the Spice Oven, you could flavor inject delicious wings with jalapeño cheddar filling and spice it up!

Vegetarian or Vegan?

The Spice Oven has got you covered! Place your delicious vegetables, veggie burgers, or "almost meat" dishes in the Spice Oven steamer and allow our proprietary steam to give them a hint of flavor. You can also place your food inside the Spice Oven and allow our patented injectors to spray one of our full flavor spice packets on them!

Seafood! Pasta! Steam it in The Spice Oven.

With the Spice Oven steamer, you can add steamed seafood and pasta to your menu!

Purchase Spice Oven’s dry spice packet via The Spice Oven’s app for an extra kick to your Spice Oven steamed foods! Sprinkle Spice Oven’s dry spice packet on your seafood, vegetables, and pasta, and steam it in the Spice Oven- It's that easy!

Bake like a pro, without all the mess!

Designed with unique flavor injectors, the Spice Oven allows you to place your cupcake pan in... and let the Spice Oven do the rest!! 

The Spice Oven’s patented injector system will fill cups with cake batter. Once baked and cooled down, the patented injectors will fill the inside of the cupcake with fruit filling, frosting, or cream of your choice, and frost the top of the cupcake as well! WOW!

Cooking is a breeze with The Spice Oven! Even your Jr. Chef will want to join in!

 

Tech Specs

Steamer easy access one push to open.

Spice Oven Steamer with pressure release exit.



SPICE OVEN, BY THE NUMBERS

Smart Kitchen Appliances


The size of the global smart kitchen market is projected to reach 14.47 billion U.S. dollars in 2019, an expected increase of around a billion from the previous year. The market is expected to grow through 2027, reaching up to 43 billion U.S. dollars by then. Wi-Fi or Bluetooth capabilities are the typical ways kitchen appliances become connected.


The revenue in the Smart Appliances segment in the USA is projected to reach $4.202 billion in 2020. This Revenue is expected to show an impressive annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2024) of 21.0%, resulting in a projected market volume of $9.002 billion by 2024. The household penetration will be 12.5% in 2020 and is expected to hit 21.3% by 2024 which is significant considering the number of households in the country. The average revenue per installed Smart Home currently is expected to amount to $263.70. The Smart Appliances segment is expected to show a revenue growth of 29.8% in 2021 up from 5.5% in 2020. Notably, unlike many other products whose revenue growth dipped into the red in 2020, these products maintained a positive growth - though at a decreased rate. This highlights an existing strong market appetite for smart appliances in the market that the firm can ride on. Product penetration for Smart Small appliances, such as the Spice Oven, will be at 9.2% in 2020 and is projected to increase to 15.6% by 2024- a significant penetration rate in less than five years.

 

 

MARKET DRIVERS

 


CUSTOMER SERVICE

This may be our first campaign, but we understand the risks and challenges associated with the process! Unexpected issues may arise, and if they do we always address them with our customers’ satisfaction at the top of our priorities list. For the sake of transparency, we pride ourselves on approaching all challenges head-on!

 

 

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

 
We're glad you asked! We have made great strides in solidifying a social media presence. However, to propel The Spice Oven to the next level, backing this campaign will help ease the costs of further prototyping and development of a product we are sure will be a game-changer when it hits the market!
 

FAMILY FIRST!!
Join the Spice Oven Family TODAY by backing this crowdfunding campaign! Our personalized perks are designed to make you feel like you are in the kitchen with us. It is our goal to make that dream a reality in the coming months! Thank You for your support!
story_txt:
Our vision is to reimagine the way we all spend time cooking.  As a working wife and mother of five,  I understand first hand the challenges faced with time management and taking care of a family! With this self-cleaning and energy-efficient oven, every cooking experience will be transformed. Now you can flavor, cook, bake, reheat, and steam without even having to be in the kitchen! We are confident that we are on the cutting edge of a revolutionary way of cooking!Joining The Spice Oven community allows you special access to our mobile app. The technology connected with the Spice Oven is advanced, yet easy enough for everyday use. Through our mobile app capabilities, Spice Oven offers notifications when food is ready, suggested shopping lists, calorie counts, and much more!We've done so much, and we've come so far but we still need your backing to help us bring Spice Oven into every kitchen! WHAT IS THE SPICE OVEN?

 
The Spice Oven is a smart oven that has a sleek finish and high-quality construction with intuitive digital controls that you can easily use to program the smart oven - regardless of the recipe. The stainless-steel outer panels are safe to the touch while the triple-layer glass oven door allows one to see what’s cooking. The interior light also allows for easy viewing as meals are being prepared. The automatic infusers, that use a patented technology and come inbuilt into the oven, simplify and automate the spicing of meats making the cooking process more enjoyable and fulfilling! 
 
 HOW IT WORKSBy pairing The Spice Oven to the supported app, you can remotely control The Spice Oven's temperature, settings, time, date and see the progress of the food cooking inside of it. Also, you can set up notifications that will notify you of the remaining cook time as well as send out notifications and alerts to your phone when the food is done and ready to eat! The spice oven app also allows you to select multiple flavor profiles, purchase spice packets and create daily, weekly, or monthly menu options, provide suggested grocery lists, track calories, and count carbs.Not only does the Spice Oven serve a function- but it also serves a purpose!
Meal Prep
Meal planning
Cook
Flavor
Bake
Steam
Self-cleaning
Automatic Infusers 
Digital controls
Are you still feeling conflicted on what to cook with your Spice Oven? There are many recipe recommendations on the site and through the app that will guide you in making memorable meals for you and your family. The website also links to an exclusive community of Spice Oven Enthusiasts with many recommendations and tips to share.You'll be able to make a steak that’s juicy on the inside and perfectly crusted on the outside, with broccoli that's firm yet fully cooked with little to no preparation times.With this amount of control, you can create your own combination of cooking methods to execute your own dishes to perfection, all with one device-The Spice Oven! SPICE IT UP TONIGHT, WITH THE SPICE OVEN APP!  
The Spice Oven was made to deliver a powerful performance that lets you create everything from steamed veggies and roasted chicken to your favorite cupcakes and chocolate chip cookies. Our Spice Oven circulates warm air for even heating, flavorful cooking, and results that speak for themselves (guaranteed!). Best of all, our oven is a great, space-saving option for all kitchens-no matter how small.

Explore! Experiment! Create! 

Making meatballs has never been easier! Add ground meat to our Spice Oven meatball pan and let the oven wow you! Let our patented injectors fill your meatballs with mozzarella, cheddar, marinara sauce, or simply spice it up with one of our other spice packets.

 Add a little spice! And eat well! 
In addition to our wide range of spice packet options, add jalapeño cheddar to your favorites list! With the Spice Oven, you could flavor inject delicious wings with jalapeño cheddar filling and spice it up!

Vegetarian or Vegan?
The Spice Oven has got you covered! Place your delicious vegetables, veggie burgers, or "almost meat" dishes in the Spice Oven steamer and allow our proprietary steam to give them a hint of flavor. You can also place your food inside the Spice Oven and allow our patented injectors to spray one of our full flavor spice packets on them!

Seafood! Pasta! Steam it in The Spice Oven. 
With the Spice Oven steamer, you can add steamed seafood and pasta to your menu!
Purchase Spice Oven’s dry spice packet via The Spice Oven’s app for an extra kick to your Spice Oven steamed foods! Sprinkle Spice Oven’s dry spice packet on your seafood, vegetables, and pasta, and steam it in the Spice Oven- It's that easy!

Bake like a pro, without all the mess!
Designed with unique flavor injectors, the Spice Oven allows you to place your cupcake pan in... and let the Spice Oven do the rest!! 

The Spice Oven’s patented injector system will fill cups with cake batter. Once baked and cooled down, the patented injectors will fill the inside of the cupcake with fruit filling, frosting, or cream of your choice, and frost the top of the cupcake as well! WOW!
Cooking is a breeze with The Spice Oven! Even your Jr. Chef will want to join in!

 
Tech Specs
Steamer easy access one push to open.

Spice Oven Steamer with pressure release exit.



SPICE OVEN, BY THE NUMBERS

Smart Kitchen Appliances
The size of the global smart kitchen market is projected to reach 14.47 billion U.S. dollars in 2019, an expected increase of around a billion from the previous year. The market is expected to grow through 2027, reaching up to 43 billion U.S. dollars by then. Wi-Fi or Bluetooth capabilities are the typical ways kitchen appliances become connected.

The revenue in the Smart Appliances segment in the USA is projected to reach $4.202 billion in 2020. This Revenue is expected to show an impressive annual growth rate (CAGR 2020-2024) of 21.0%, resulting in a projected market volume of $9.002 billion by 2024. The household penetration will be 12.5% in 2020 and is expected to hit 21.3% by 2024 which is significant considering the number of households in the country. The average revenue per installed Smart Home currently is expected to amount to $263.70. The Smart Appliances segment is expected to show a revenue growth of 29.8% in 2021 up from 5.5% in 2020. Notably, unlike many other products whose revenue growth dipped into the red in 2020, these products maintained a positive growth - though at a decreased rate. This highlights an existing strong market appetite for smart appliances in the market that the firm can ride on. Product penetration for Smart Small appliances, such as the Spice Oven, will be at 9.2% in 2020 and is projected to increase to 15.6% by 2024- a significant penetration rate in less than five years.
 

 
MARKET DRIVERS
 


CUSTOMER SERVICE

This may be our first campaign, but we understand the risks and challenges associated with the process! Unexpected issues may arise, and if they do we always address them with our customers’ satisfaction at the top of our priorities list. For the sake of transparency, we pride ourselves on approaching all challenges head-on!
 

 
HOW CAN YOU HELP? We're glad you asked! We have made great strides in solidifying a social media presence. However, to propel The Spice Oven to the next level, backing this campaign will help ease the costs of further prototyping and development of a product we are sure will be a game-changer when it hits the market! FAMILY FIRST!!Join the Spice Oven Family TODAY by backing this crowdfunding campaign! Our personalized perks are designed to make you feel like you are in the kitchen with us. It is our goal to make that dream a reality in the coming months! Thank You for your support!

story:
LiCK is a chef inspired ice cream shop with a scoop of Pop, Art and 90s R&B all sprinkled with Black Girl Magic.

Come, be a part of LiCK the Hip.Art.Pop Ice Cream Shoppe!

 

LICK LEGACY

“Most of my fondest important  nostalgic moments involve my secret love affair with Ice  Cream.  It is the sole culinary treat that has never let me down and has always remained consistently satisfying.

As a child, one of my greatest joys was to chase the gleaming truck  down the street clutching all the change I could quickly scrape together.   After moving overseas to Japan I found  solace in the familiarity  a scoop of  Baskin Robbins Pink Bubble Gum while  I adjusted to new life and culture.  While in college I found joy in chocolate chip with nuts , whipped cream and sprinkles  at numerous Johnson and Wales University ice cream socials,  where unbeknownst to me at the time I’d already met my future husband.  Now, as an expecting  mommy to be , Ice Cream is my  ultimate kryptonite and daily craving necessity for our growing little one.

Building  and creating a physical legacy  where our child can create their own memories with family and friends is especially important to us.  We’ve decided to create Lynch’s Ice Cream Kitchen (LICK) as a  namesake  where we are able to fuse part of  our personal foundation, a love of old school hip hop,  gatherings with those close to us and creating culinary decadence .  Using my love for  ice cream was the  perfect metaphorical cherry on  top  as way to use the ultimate  pinnacle of unity to pay homage to our family of loved  ones ,  because like us ,we  are an incredible representation of all flavors, colors, cultures,  and origins . 

My sincerest purpose is  to share things we love within the community where part our family grew up and was create in a unique , eclectic way, providing a safe haven for all to create their own memories.”

Sonya Renee Lynch

LICK Co-Creator Owner

 

LICK CINCY

Created by two Chefs and 30-year residents of College Hill, Damion and Sonya Lynch the Lynch’s Ice Cream Kitchen "LICK" will redefine the neighborhood Ice Cream Shoppe. The iridescent walls will frame the neon back lit Hip Pop Art décor and LICK’s own Cartoon Characters. LICK will wax traditional yet blend in the feel of 90s R&B and Pop influences. It will focus on curation of a traditional sweet shop and fresh fruit juice bar items with a culinary flair. LICK will be the restaurant of ice cream shops. We will showcase chef inspired sundaes made with fresh creamery ice cream, classic desserts and feature a warm pastry bar serving desserts from local favorites. The menu will include seasonal smoothies, fitness shakes for athletes and pressed juices. The jewel of LICK will be the seasonal chocolate shop where customers can watch guest chefs prepare handmade chocolates on site. LICK will offer branded merchandise available in-store and online. LICK will serve as a cornerstone in the College Hill community by hosting local events like cruise-ins, book clubs and ice cream socials. LICK will promote hiring from within the community and participation in neighborhood development. 

LICK will offer more than just an ice cream shop it will be a fully faceted and branded ecosystem: 

• “Scoop: The Making of Lick” will be a professionally shot reality/documentary cooking show following the building of LICK and behind the scenes of what it takes to run the business. 

• LICK will also feature bicycle Ice Cream Carts called Ice-Cycles and seasonal Cookies N’ Milk carts for special events. 

• Cookies N’ Milk will be a seasonal event-based concept that features heated to order cookies and pastries to accompany chilled milk products or hot beverages in convenient packed-lunch style boxes. 

• Our Little Queens & Kings children’s birthday parties will feature Candy making classes, Ice Cream Socials and Kid Karaoke. 

• For the adults LICK will offer Upscale Ice Cream Socials, catered/hosted parties or events featuring LICK ice creams and pastries. 

• Also for adults LICK will offer Date Night Chocolates where couples learn candy making and chocolate work. 

OUR STORY 

Our Story began in 2001 upon meeting one another at Johnson and Wales University while studying Culinary Arts. We bonded immediately sharing a common passion for creating unforgettable culinary dishes and hosting events which led to a close personal relationship. We continued to work alongside one another in business and were married in Charleston, South Carolina in 2010. Thereafter, we continued to work in the restaurant industry honing our skill set, while assisting in the development, opening, and operating of several Cincinnati restaurants. After a tedious 15 year run in the industry, we decided to effectively “ retire” from working in the industry full time to focus on our own independent desires. Damion attended Salmon P. Chase Law School at Northern Kentucky University earning a Juris Doctorate degree and passing the Bar Exam in late 2020. I, (Sonya) pursued my dream of becoming a published fictional author and freelance journalist. 

Though we were on hiatus we continued to do freelance restaurant consulting, as well as some personal chef and small catering events. In our spare time we continued to keep our culinary creativity afloat by hosting weekly gatherings for friends called “Foodie Fridays” including wine and cheese parties, seafood boils and date night cooking lessons. 

The memorable experiences from our gatherings, the extenuating circumstances of pandemic along with numerous requests for recipes ultimately led to the inspiration and development ChefBobbombs. 

Our inspiration for LICK originate from the personal desire to leave a continuing, lasting legacy with our namesake for our children. Additionally, we wanted like to pay to homage to our childhood memories, families and those who influenced us along the way personally and within the culinary industry. 

"Our ultimate goal is to become a beacon and a staple in College Hill where our family was created, and where we will now raise our children. Building the neighborhood while providing a safe pinnacle for our guests to create their own memories.” 

-Sonya Lynch 

 

What We Need & What You Get

So let's break it down folks:

We are seeking $65,000 for equipment and for building out an amazing space to match our amazing concept!

(We have adjusted to $68,000 to account for fees and taxes).

  • All Contributors will receive complimentary Membership into our Ice Cream rewards program.

  • Contributors over $1000 will receive a LICK FOUNDER t-shirt and have their name listed on our founder's page.

  • Contributors over $1500 will be personally invited to our first Upscale Ice Cream Social or Chocolate Date Night.  

  • Contributors over $2500 will be personally invited to soft opening events.

  • Contributors over $3000 will have their photo featured on our founder's page.

  • Contributors over $5000 will be personally invited to the Grand Opening.  

  • Contributors over $7500 will be personally invited to our Founder's Pop up Ice Cream Shop event featuring a 3-course gourmet dinner prepared by the Lynch Chefs.

  • Contributors over $10,000 will have their names listed on founder's bricks on permanent display at LICK

  • Contributors over $15,000 will receive 1 of only 5 LICK UNLIMITED CARDS entitling holders to free ice cream for life.

  • We plan on reaching and exceeding our goal but, if we do not we will still apply the funds to equipment. 

 

The Impact

Help from you will help bring LICK will be the city’s first Hip-Art-POP Ice Cream Shop to culturalize the city. LICK will feature a classic 90s feel with the soul of a gourmet bakery. The atmosphere will feature lighted walls, iridescent glitter and animated graphics of original cartoons from the LICK Brand. LICK is energetic, colorful, and playful with a touch of urban old and new school while catering to all demographics. Our themed events such as “Kid Karaoke”, “LICK After Hours” and “Kings and Queens” parties will ensure no child, adult or those in between will miss out on the unique fun of LICK. It will be the, “Coolest Theme in Ice Cream.” 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to support financially we would love to receive your support socially! Please share our story and the link as much as you can. You are an integral part of our story still and we appreciate any moments that you give us!

story:
Origin of the Skinii

How is value defined?  This was the critical question asked when founding this start-up.  How can we create value during a time when people have endless options? According to terrapass, each year consumers go through over 600 billion paper and plastic cups.  15+ billion of those are disposable coffee cups.  Although these cups are made in part by paper, the plastic liners to ensure leak protection negate any hope of them being recyclable.  If you were to buy a cup of coffee each day, your waste generation would around 23 pounds per year.  Each cup can be responsible for up to 0.24 pounds of CO2.  Needless to say, not a very favorable carbon footprint.  This doesn't account for an estimated 20 million trees cut down per year to make these cups.  Less trees means more carbon.  It is much more difficult to quantify waste contributed by the manufacture and disposal of neoprene koozies, which are not recyclable.  If you've made it this far, we think you get the point.

Reducing your carbon footprint doesn't have to boring!  On a daily basis, we are faced with more: more decisions, more media, more advertisements, more stress, more waste, more unused things collecting dust at home.  More “stuff."  The Skinii was formed around the belief that we could all benefit from less “stuff”, and less waste on a path to a Skinii Footprint.  With your help, we aim to produce sleek yet highly functional, multi-use drinkware.  Products that provide you with value to reap the benefits of a more minimal lifestyle, freed from the clutter/waste of unused and none recyclable goods via current and future products. 

Meet the Slimm

The Slimm is a multi-use, vacuum insulated container. It functions as a slim can insulator for your favorite seltzers and slim canned beverages, as well as a tumbler for hot or cold drinks. The durable, double-walled stainless steel construction will keep your drinks at the desired temperature for hours and is built to endure outdoor adventures, as well as the wear and tear of daily life. The subtle ridges on the walls of the container provide a comfortable grip and a sleek look that fits into your modern lifestyle.

Whether you are going to that family cookout or Sunday tailgate, hiking for a sunset view, or grabbing your morning coffee to go, the Slimm has got you covered! Cup holder friendly and small enough to fit into almost any pack, the Slimm is built to go anywhere and work for all of your favorite drinks. It will keep your slim cans cold on the hottest summer days and your coffee hot long after lunch hour. It’s even one of the only tumblers that can fit under a Keurig! 

The Slimm is designed to be your go-to drinkware, built to handle any drink, any situation, allowing you to do more with less. No more stressing over misplaced mugs. No more drawers full of old, torn koozies. And no more hunting through cabinets cluttered with unused tumblers and travel mugs! Instead, you can empty the clutter from those cabinets and put one product in its place: the Slimm. Just grab the Slimm, fill it with your chosen beverage and screw on the lid that fits your needs!

 

What You Get

In exchange for your support, we are offering special discounts on our first product, the Slimm. Additionally, for those who back us at a higher level, we are offering customized engravings so that you can personalize your very own Slimm, or get customized Slimms as gifts for friends and family. 

The most exciting perk of all is offered to those who back us at the highest level - membership to our Special Access Group! This group will receive early access for the soon-to-be-released colors that are already in process and early access to future attachments that expand on the functionality of the Slimm.

The Special Access Group has the chance to get early prototypes of products that are still in development, at NO charge, in exchange for their thoughts and feedback! Consider this as inclusion into our "beta testing group," so we can integrate your feedback and optimize our products prior to production.

If we can't manage to reach our goal, we will still use the collected funds to fulfill the orders for all of our backers - including the customizations and Special Access Group membership. Our primary goal is to bring you on board as a part of the Skinii family and help all of us move towards a more functional, sustainable lifestyle. 

The Impact

Why the Slimm?

Not only is the Slimm a multi-use drinkware product, but it provides you with the personal benefits associated with a more minimalist lifestyle. With one tumbler that meets all your needs, the small decision of where to put your drink is already made for you, and your mind is freed to focus on the more important things that lie ahead. By reducing the clutter in your work and home environment, you benefit from reduced feelings of stress and anxiety and a clear mind for the day ahead. Take a step in the right direction by replacing your old collection of tumblers with the Slimm.

Skinii Footprint - Global Impact

Here at the Skinii, we believe in reducing our carbon footprint. We strive to make multi-functional products that not only replace single-use plastics products, but also eliminate the need for multiple individual products that serve a singular purpose. We believe in complementing a minimal lifestyle with highly functional products to help free ourselves from the excess of “stuff” that has become the norm. You can join us on our mission to live with intention. Do more with less. Leave behind a Skinii Footprint.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge we face now is a lack of visibility, being overshadowed by larger brands and less functional products. We’ve successfully managed to get through the design and initial production phase during the global economic strain of the pandemic. However, we are now faced with a saturation of insulators/tumblers that only serve a singular function but are backed by larger brands and expansive marketing networks. Without your help, not only could we lose our capital and time investment, but, more importantly, we could lose the opportunity to bring superior versatility into the marketplace and raise the bar of functionality for multi-use, reusable drinkware. The goal of this product category is to do more with less and consume fewer resources, and with your help, we can bring that goal back to the forefront and leave behind a Skinii Footprint.

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to backing our campaign, you can help us by spreading the word about us and our awesome product! Our main goal is to build a community of people around the Skinii who want to live more sustainably and efficiently, on a personal and global level. So please share our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family, follow us on social media, and spread the word about the Skinii Footprint!

https://www.instagram.com/the.skinii/

https://www.facebook.com/theskinii

Origin of the Skinii
How is value defined?  This was the critical question asked when founding this start-up.  How can we create value during a time when people have endless options? According to terrapass, each year consumers go through over 600 billion paper and plastic cups.  15+ billion of those are disposable coffee cups.  Although these cups are made in part by paper, the plastic liners to ensure leak protection negate any hope of them being recyclable.  If you were to buy a cup of coffee each day, your waste generation would around 23 pounds per year.  Each cup can be responsible for up to 0.24 pounds of CO2.  Needless to say, not a very favorable carbon footprint.  This doesn't account for an estimated 20 million trees cut down per year to make these cups.  Less trees means more carbon.  It is much more difficult to quantify waste contributed by the manufacture and disposal of neoprene koozies, which are not recyclable.  If you've made it this far, we think you get the point.
Reducing your carbon footprint doesn't have to boring!  On a daily basis, we are faced with more: more decisions, more media, more advertisements, more stress, more waste, more unused things collecting dust at home.  More “stuff."  The Skinii was formed around the belief that we could all benefit from less “stuff”, and less waste on a path to a Skinii Footprint.  With your help, we aim to produce sleek yet highly functional, multi-use drinkware.  Products that provide you with value to reap the benefits of a more minimal lifestyle, freed from the clutter/waste of unused and none recyclable goods via current and future products. 

Meet the Slimm

The Slimm is a multi-use, vacuum insulated container. It functions as a slim can insulator for your favorite seltzers and slim canned beverages, as well as a tumbler for hot or cold drinks. The durable, double-walled stainless steel construction will keep your drinks at the desired temperature for hours and is built to endure outdoor adventures, as well as the wear and tear of daily life. The subtle ridges on the walls of the container provide a comfortable grip and a sleek look that fits into your modern lifestyle.

Whether you are going to that family cookout or Sunday tailgate, hiking for a sunset view, or grabbing your morning coffee to go, the Slimm has got you covered! Cup holder friendly and small enough to fit into almost any pack, the Slimm is built to go anywhere and work for all of your favorite drinks. It will keep your slim cans cold on the hottest summer days and your coffee hot long after lunch hour. It’s even one of the only tumblers that can fit under a Keurig! 
The Slimm is designed to be your go-to drinkware, built to handle any drink, any situation, allowing you to do more with less. No more stressing over misplaced mugs. No more drawers full of old, torn koozies. And no more hunting through cabinets cluttered with unused tumblers and travel mugs! Instead, you can empty the clutter from those cabinets and put one product in its place: the Slimm. Just grab the Slimm, fill it with your chosen beverage and screw on the lid that fits your needs! 
What You Get

In exchange for your support, we are offering special discounts on our first product, the Slimm. Additionally, for those who back us at a higher level, we are offering customized engravings so that you can personalize your very own Slimm, or get customized Slimms as gifts for friends and family. 
The most exciting perk of all is offered to those who back us at the highest level - membership to our Special Access Group! This group will receive early access for the soon-to-be-released colors that are already in process and early access to future attachments that expand on the functionality of the Slimm.

The Special Access Group has the chance to get early prototypes of products that are still in development, at NO charge, in exchange for their thoughts and feedback! Consider this as inclusion into our "beta testing group," so we can integrate your feedback and optimize our products prior to production.

If we can't manage to reach our goal, we will still use the collected funds to fulfill the orders for all of our backers - including the customizations and Special Access Group membership. Our primary goal is to bring you on board as a part of the Skinii family and help all of us move towards a more functional, sustainable lifestyle. 


The Impact
Why the Slimm?
Not only is the Slimm a multi-use drinkware product, but it provides you with the personal benefits associated with a more minimalist lifestyle. With one tumbler that meets all your needs, the small decision of where to put your drink is already made for you, and your mind is freed to focus on the more important things that lie ahead. By reducing the clutter in your work and home environment, you benefit from reduced feelings of stress and anxiety and a clear mind for the day ahead. Take a step in the right direction by replacing your old collection of tumblers with the Slimm.
Skinii Footprint - Global Impact
Here at the Skinii, we believe in reducing our carbon footprint. We strive to make multi-functional products that not only replace single-use plastics products, but also eliminate the need for multiple individual products that serve a singular purpose. We believe in complementing a minimal lifestyle with highly functional products to help free ourselves from the excess of “stuff” that has become the norm. You can join us on our mission to live with intention. Do more with less. Leave behind a Skinii Footprint.


Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge we face now is a lack of visibility, being overshadowed by larger brands and less functional products. We’ve successfully managed to get through the design and initial production phase during the global economic strain of the pandemic. However, we are now faced with a saturation of insulators/tumblers that only serve a singular function but are backed by larger brands and expansive marketing networks. Without your help, not only could we lose our capital and time investment, but, more importantly, we could lose the opportunity to bring superior versatility into the marketplace and raise the bar of functionality for multi-use, reusable drinkware. The goal of this product category is to do more with less and consume fewer resources, and with your help, we can bring that goal back to the forefront and leave behind a Skinii Footprint.


Other Ways You Can Help
In addition to backing our campaign, you can help us by spreading the word about us and our awesome product! Our main goal is to build a community of people around the Skinii who want to live more sustainably and efficiently, on a personal and global level. So please share our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family, follow us on social media, and spread the word about the Skinii Footprint!
https://www.instagram.com/the.skinii/
https://www.facebook.com/theskinii

story:
Hello, and welcome to the Blackbarrel Brewery, housed at Whitebarrel Winery! 

Eighteen years ago, Rik Obiso was working in the biotech industry in our nation's capital when he had a dream to create a farm that encompassed "all things fermented." He scoured the East Coast for the perfect place in which to realize this dream, and when he discovered the beautiful New River Valley in Virginia, he knew his search was over. In 2006, he left Washington, DC and the corporate world to settle in Christiansburg and establish the antecedent of Whitebarrel Winery. In 2015, he married Tess and they formed a partnership to turn this small, locally focused business into something with a positive impact on the community, environment, and the Virginia alcoholic beverage industry.

From these modest roots, Whitebarrel has grown to become one of the largest wineries in southwest Virginia. The Whitebarrel brand can now be found in stores and restaurants across Virginia and the Washington, DC area. In 2017, we expanded our grounds to include more vineyards and gardens in Floyd County, VA, and opened the first of our expanded winery locations in downtown Blacksburg, VA (Blacksburg Wine Bar, 301 South Main Street). As our wine operations expanded, we also embarked on a journey to start brewing 100% Virginia beer made from 100% local ingredients, and thus, Blackbarrel Brewery was born.

From day one, our team at Whitebarrel has been focused on providing quality service, wine, and farm-to-table food in a welcoming, relaxing environment, and we are excited to be able to bring this same dedication to excellence to the world of beer.

Blackbarrel Brewery will be a natural complement to Whitebarrel Winery. We look forward to offering a variety of beers in our tasting room, from clean and crisp lagers to hop-forward pale ales to barrel-aged saisons and stouts. All of our delicious brews will be made from ingredients found right here on our farm, including beers that are loaded with grains grown between the rows of our vineyard, porters and stouts that are aged in barrels from our winery, and experimental brews made from our fresh fruits and herbs. (We already have an excellent recipe for lavender hefeweizen--made with wheat from our vineyard and lavender from our herb garden--that we can't wait to share with you!)

Our beer ingredients will be grown using the same bio-dynamic approach that we take to wine-making, including mostly organic treatments with a focus on sustainable farming practices. At Blackbarrel, we will continue to apply the practices that have earned Whitebarrel a "Virginia Green" certification, including recycling 95% or more of our waste, composting all of our vineyard and food scraps, and recycling water through our bio-retention system. We are dedicated to preserving our environment and minimizing our carbon footprint in our wine-making...and now in our beer-making, too.

After years of careful planning and experimentation, our hop garden is now in its second year (with six varieties of hops for your drinking pleasure), barley and rye are growing in the vineyard rows, and we've broken ground on our production area and are ready to outfit it with all of our brewery equipment. We've laid a strong foundation and are so ready to move forward, but we need your help to get across the finish line.

 

What we need

Our campaign is solely focused on getting the commercial equipment we need to bring our delicious brews to life. We only need four main components to make this happen:

  1. The brewing system (approx. $35,000)
  2. The walk-in refrigeration system (approx. $19,000)
  3. The kegs and upgrades to our tasting room (approx. $8,000)
  4. A hop oaster to finish processing the hops (approx. $2,000)

 

Why support us?

By contributing to our campaign, you will help us open a new chapter and bring Rik even closer to realizing his dream of creating more delicious products under that "all things fermented" umbrella.

We initially funded the brewery with our own savings and small loans from family and friends, but we have encountered some unexpected costs that have really hampered our ability to grow. We are so grateful to have made it this far, and we are eager to be able to finally offer beer to our guests. We can't wait to share what we have been working on, and we deeply appreciate your continued support in the home stretch. Every little bit helps!

The impact of your contribution

Your support will allow us to continue to fulfill the social and environmental responsibilities that our farm, winery, and brewery create. As part of our commitment to our community, we have worked hard to create new jobs and develop future leaders. We offer fair wages and competitive benefits to our employees, and we continuously invest in their growth and development. Beyond our investments in our staff, we relish the opportunity to have a positive impact in our area through fundraisers and donations for local-not-for-profits (in the last seven years, we are proud to have contributed over $125,000 in scholarships and donations!), education and awareness programs, and support of other local and sustainable businesses.

What you get

We are not looking for donations. We want to give you an opportunity to be a part of Blackbarrel Brewery from the beginning, and we want you to feel well-compensated for your contributions. We hope you enjoy the perks we have put together as our way of saying thanks!

Since Blackbarrel is an offshoot of an established business, we are positioned to offer you some very unique perks that we are sure you will love. From t-shirts to tours, from beer discounts to membership in our special Barrel Club and Founder's Club, we have the perfect perk for you, your friends, and your family.

 

What if we don't reach our goal?

Even if we don't reach our funding target, we will still be opening in the future, perhaps just not as we planned, and with much smaller batches brewed without the equipment.

 

How else can you help?

We understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute financially to this campaign, but you can still help by spreading the word about Blackbarrel Brewery and this campaign to your friends, families, and neighbors.

story:
Short Summary

Thank you again for your willingness to help me out! Its time for me to take Blazin Crackers to the next level!

For those of you who don't know me, my name is Uvonne Gooch. I'm the owner of Blazin Crackers and I'm an experienced cook and food creator. Driven by the desire to put smiles on people's faces, I take pride in providing the best tasting product possible.

My passion for cooking can be traced back to my grandmother, where I spent significant time working on learning how to season food properly and how to taste a dish to determine what was in it. As a cook, I specialize in Southern dishes, mainly Soul Food.

I have worked at my craft for 14 years, gaining experience in selling, creating and expanding the product line. If you couldn't tell: I'm PASSIONATE ABOUT THESE PRODUCTS!!!

I started my business at home before moving on to do it full time by traveling to different events. While my many engagements have taken me around the world, I'm proud to call Nashville, TN home.

As a one lady band, I have long dreamed of taking this business to the next level.  This funding will allow me to establish a base of manufacturing and distribution that is necessary for true business expansion.  There is no way I will be able to achieve my goals and dreams by relying solely on my own efforts!  Getting this funding for Blazin Crackers will be the difference between me having a successful business hobby and me having a success national and/or international corporation! 


What We Need & What You Get

My goal for this campaign is to raise $250,000 in order to expand on a national (and eventually international) scale. This will fund:

  • a new customer friendly website (producing faster orders, allowing for cheaper prices, and the ability for you to get crackers and popcorn and tea easier than ever!)
  • a new manufacturing facility (a commercial kitchen along with enough employees to be able to manufacture a LOT of crackers and popcorn!
  • a new distribution center (for lightning fast in house packaging and fulfillment of our amazing products) 
  • new branding and promotional items (new packaging and new merchandise) 

Please help me achieve my goal by donating to receive some of my amazing crackers, popcorn or tea starting on March 18th. Every donation will include a free vacation voucher as a way for me to say "thank you" for helping me achieve my dream through this company.

Blazin Crackers Donation Rewards

over $50

1 free 4 day/3 night vacation voucher (7 destination choices)

over $100

1 free 3 day/2 night vacation voucher (50 destination choices)

over $150

1 free 6 day/5 night Mexican Beachfront vacation voucher (7 destination choices) AND
1 free 4 day/3 night vacation voucher (7 destination choices)

over $250

1 free 4 day/3 night All Inclusive Beachfront Resort vacation voucher (Bahamas, Dominican Republic or Playacar, Mexico) or  
1 free 8 day/7 night Resort Getaway (Over 80 destination choices) AND
1 free 4 day/3 night vacation voucher (7 destinations)

over $500

1 free 3-7 night Cruise vacation voucher (7 destination choices, 8 port choices) AND
1 free 3day/2 night vacation voucher (50 destination choices)

over $1000

2 Free Event Tickets (you choose the event in your area),
1 free 4 day/3 night All Inclusive Beachfront Resort vacation voucher (Bahamas, Dominican Republic or Playacar, Mexico) , or
1 free 8 day/7 night Resort Getaway (Over 80 destination choices)  AND

1 free 3 day/2 night vacation voucher (50 destinations)

$1000+

We’ll let you know!!!


Even if we don't reach our entire goal, the funds I raise will allow me to take steps to make my overall product development and production even faster and easier.  I may not be able to have my own inhouse manufacturing and distribution, but I can still rebrand by revamping and relaunching my website, lease the manufacturing and distribution space and be that much closer to my dream of national and international expansion.


The Impact

I not only want to prove to myself that I am a capable business woman, but as a single woman, mother and grandmother, I want to inspire others to follow their dreams and push hard to achieve their dreams.

These crackers and popcorn and tea are absolutely delicious! Everyone who loves hot food needs to try them! They will absolutely make your tastebuds sing and make your mouth dance! You'll be SO happy you tried them!  I put my heart and soul into every single bite!

Please assist me in this dream and help me not only inspire tastebuds around the world, but inspire women around the world as well!


Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdles I've had so far to making this business successful have been in trying to do it all by myself.  Currently, I'm the everything: I create products, I develop products, I manufacture products, I package products, I distribute products, I do everything for these products!

Don't get me wrong: I absolutely LOVE these products (and you will too)!  However, in order for me to truly take this business to the next level, I need your assistance.  In exchange for helping me, you get to enjoy our delicious products and I hope to hook you in as my newest Crackerhead!

The donations from this campaign will allow me to alleviate these problems by getting the facilities and assistance I need to truly take this business to the levels I know it can achieve.


Other Ways You Can Help

If for any reason you aren't able to assist me with my goals at this time, please do one of the following:

  • PLEASE HELP ME GET THE WORD OUT!!!  Tell someone to try these amazing crackers, popcorn and tea and help me achieve my dream!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to tell someone about my campaign!

Thank you immensely for your assistance!

Uvonne Gooch, Owner Blazin Crackers

story:
.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.

Check Out My Daily Video Updates Below

Check Out My Daily Video Updates Here 

Sign up for our newsletter here

.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.

 

What is Try Vegan®?

 

Try Vegan® started in 2014 as an idea to raise awareness for veganism through my passion for both sustainable change and business. I started by creating a business plan for a restaurant but quickly realized finding an investor to give me $250,000 in a niche that had not yet shown signs of life in my area was a tough sell. I was 26 at the time and living with my parents so I decided to take my savings and build my own food truck. I began by asking my neighbor if he knew anyone selling a truck and he told me he had not only one but two identical shuttle buses he was looking to sell. He gave them to me for a great price, and on May 16th 2015, I quit my job and spent the summer trying to figure out how to build a food truck from scratch in my parent's driveway.

On September 19th 2015, I had my first event in Trenton, NJ where Try Vegan did its first $650 in sales. It was not much, but it was a milestone that showed all my hard work had yielded a return, and more importantly, the truck I built actually passed a formal health inspection :).  Since then,  the business has evolved and expanded while remaining true to the original vision of bringing healthy vegan food to the people while also sharing knowledge and education about the impact a simple diet change can bring. The truck can always be found with a "Did You Know" banner showcasing the positive impact a vegan lifestyle can have to your overall health, the environment, and our future.

Try Vegan® comes from humble beginnings and has grand ambitions. Over the past 4 years, I have built two food trucks, a mobile app, multiple websites, a clothing line, Try Vegan TV, a podcast, and a meal prep delivery service.

The momentum of the market has has outpaced my finances and I need capital to keep up with the demand from the market. I want to keep Try Vegan® independent so that I can keep my costs as low as possible while remaining true to my vision without outside influence.

To learn more about Try Vegan® Visit Our Website

 

Try Vegan® Food Truck

The food truck has been the backbone of the operation and I have put my heart and soul into building it into what it is today. If you would have asked me 5 years ago what I wanted to do with my life, I would tell you I wanted to go to music festivals with my friends and teach people the benefits of a vegan lifestyle. Through finding my purpose and acting upon it, I have been able to manifest that dream and bring it into a reality by vending at some of the most iconic music festivals in the Northeast including Governor's Ball, Made in America, Moonrise, and Afropunk. Being able to provide food to people like me who used to be unable to find anything other than french fries has been incredibly rewarding. I truly understand how heartfelt and sincere their thank yous are because I was once in their shoes and have now become what I was looking for. 

I currently have one truck in operation while the other truck is in need of updated equipment and staffing. With proper capital, I will be able to equip the second truck and have the ability to pay someone to take it out full time to spread awareness and provide healthy vegan food to those who need it. 

To learn more about the truck visit Try Vegan Food Truck

 

*New* Try Vegan® Restaurant in Morris County

Try Vegan has been presented with an opportunity to purchase a vegan restaurant in Morris County! This would allow us to have our own brick and mortar restaurant in the county with the highest demand. With your support, this could become a reality as soon as this winter! We would love to be able to have a space to call our own to serve you better, park our trucks, and have our own commercial kitchen. 

Your support would help us provide vegan food for those in Morris county where our services are in the highest demand

 

Try Vegan® Meal Prep Delivery Service

The Try Vegan® Meal Prep delivery service was and idea that sparked in November 2017 when a friend asked if I could make vegan meals for him and a few friends because they wanted to Try Vegan but did not know how. I saw this could be the beginning of a new endeavor and since the food truck season had ended, I was able to invest the time in getting the business started. I set out to create an all organic meal prep service that did not use oil, gluten, soy, or refined sugars which focused on whole food plant based meals and before I knew it, it was up and running.

Once the food truck season came back around, I found myself in a position where I would have to prepare for and vend at a large scale festival in another state for the weekend, drive home at 3 am on Sunday, take a nap, and be at the grocery store at 7am to start meal prepping at 9am. From there we had to prepare all of  the meals and once finished, I had to deliver them in my 2004 Honda Pilot with 220,000 miles all across the state of New Jersey. Needless to say, it has required an extensive amount of work to keep it running.

In October 2018 I was on track to sign a huge deal with the biggest meal prep service in our area in which they would make all our meals for us and we take a small portion. I felt a huge sigh of relief knowing this amount of work would finally pay off. The universe had a different plan and the deal fell through. I was devastated since I thought I had finally reached the point where all the time spent working had on this project would have finally paid off. Little did I know this "loss" is what ignited my competitive edge and made me want to create something bigger and better with a larger reach.  I set my focus on how to build a bigger foundation for Try Vegan Meal Prep and began figuring out how to package and ship meals through a carrier such as UPS. After four months of intense focus and concentration everything was in place and our reach went from being available to only 4 counties in New Jersey  to the entire state and also New York, Pennsylvania,  Delaware, Maryland, Vermont, Massachusetts, Connecticut, and Rhode Island. Once we have refined the process enough and have acquired the proper needed to scale, we will be available from Georgia up to Maine and out to Michigan. 

Currently, there are two major bottlenecks which more capital would help alleviate. The first is our vacuum sealing process and the second is our shared kitchen with limited time and storage availability. We currently use standard Food Saver vacuum sealers and are in need of a larger commercial unit to grow to the scale we desire.  With enough funding, we could also begin looking for or own kitchen which we could certify as vegan and gluten free. Once we have the ability to scale to the capacity required, we would also unlock two day shipping which would allow us to deliver to nearly all of the eastern seaboard from Main to Georgia and out to Michigan. 

To learn more about our meal prep delivery service visit Try Vegan Meal Delivery

 

Try Vegan® Clothing

Try Vegan® clothing began in January 2017 as the second expression of my goal to build Try Vegan into an all encompassing vegan brand. I spent countless hours researching and learning about screen-printing in order to find the best equipment I could afford used on Craigslist in order to start my clothing company. I taught myself how to use Adobe Illustrator to make designs, the complex process of  screen printing, as well as how to operate and maintain all the equipment needed to make my own shirts.  Since I had put together all the pieces needed to screen print clothing for myself, I realized I could do it for others and started a custom screen printing company called Quality Custom Prints. I have since dropped QCP to focus all my efforts toward growing Try Vegan, since it is what I am the most passionate and driven to do. 

Try Vegan® Clothing is still available although I am focused more heavily on the other aspects of the business. With more funding, I will be able to hire a professional designer to take the clothing to the next level (I have designed all of the items in the store myself), as well as someone to focus on marketing, selling, and growing the clothing brand.  

You can visit our Try Vegan Clothing Store here

 

Try Vegan® Mobile App

I hope I haven't lost you by this point, but I have been quite busy laying the groundwork for this project the past 3 and a half years, lol. Creating an app was something I knew I wanted to do given the tremendous ability to scale your reach since there is a phone attached to nearly every hand these days.  I wanted to build an app that was a one stop shop for all your vegan needs - recipes, videos, blogs, clothing, a community, as well as an easy way to order our products and meals. Building an app would allow Try Vegan to spread information and awareness across international boarders. 

My quest for an app began in December 2017 when I found an outside party who agreed to create an app for both Android and iOS. After a year of waiting and constant follow up, the iOS app still had not been developed and the Android app was lacking in functionality. At this point, I knew I had to roll up my sleeves and take the project into my own hands. I set out to teach myself how to build an app and a few weeks later, the app I created was released for both Android and iPhone. 

Since I am not a professional app developer and I have had no prior experience making an app, the app is missing some functionality I would have liked to have built into it. With proper financing, I would be able to hire a professional app developer to create an updated version of the app that includes these functions

Learn more about our app for Android and iPhone

 

20% By 2020

Here is a is a fun one - 

I had the idea to start a movement 20% by 2020 in 2017 after researching vegan statistics and looking at trends. I noticed prior to 2015 people who associated with a vegan diet was less than 1% of the population and by 2017 it skyrocketed to 7% of the population. At that moment, I realized there was a real possibility that number could balloon to 20% by the year 2020 if we all worked together to spread our message of compassion, love, understanding, and knowledge. I have been working as hard as I can to make Try Vegan a profitable business and have been unable to spearhead this movement the way I would have liked. If you are interested in helping in any way shape or form, up to and including leading the charge of this movement - please reach out!

With proper funding for this project, I would be able to raise more awareness through advertising campaigns spreading information to people who would not otherwise receive it. I would use mainstream avenues such as billboards, television commercials, audio ads, etc explaining the health, environmental, and sustainability benefits of plant based eating similar to anti-smoking/anti-big tobacco ads. 

 

Try Vegan TV / Content Creation

Through building the business of Try Vegan I have been able to meet some amazing people who share the vision and are using their unique skills to help reach our desired goal of helping people.

Our current content includes

  • Try Vegan Food Truck adventures
  • Vince's Indiegogo Journey
  • Erin's Ethical Eats
  • Rawfully Tempting
  • Conscious Yoga
  • Vegan Mommy Blog
  • Catching up with Vince Podcast

With your support, we will be able to get professional equipment as opposed to our current set up of cell phone cameras as recording devices.  

As an added bonus, if we reach a goal beyond our wildest expectations, we will create a documentary style reality show based around the Try Vegan lifestyle!

 

How can I help, Vince

Last year, Try Vegan took a hit in the peak food the season in July and August with most of our bigger weekend events being rained out. This translated into thousands of dollars in lost revenue, and I have been trying to catch up ever since. I am at the part in my story where my high interest credit cards have been maxed out, and my life savings is spent. 

I created this Indiegogo Campaign to ask for your support in building the bridge from where Try Vegan is to where it can be once it reaches its full potential. Your support would allow me to continue to grow the vision for Try Vegan without any outside influence. 

Aside from financial assistance, If you feel you have any skills or expertise you would be able to offer please feel free to reach out! 

 

What makes you think you're the right person for the job?

Aside from putting all of these pieces in place while managing them and making sure they all have enough resources and attention to grow, I also have an extensive business background. I graduated from Rowan University with a dual major in Business Management and Human Resource Management and have over a decade of working experience in the most efficiently run big box retailers. During my last 5 years of employment, I was a salaried manager and was responsible for stores doing over $65 million in annual revenue. I had over 250 employees working with me in the stores I managed and was responsible for knowing the ins and outs of inventory, hiring and firing, policy, fielding customer complaints and issues, refrigeration units, procedures for things like Black Friday's and snowstorms, as well as a number of things customers may not even be aware of. 

Although it seems like I have a lot on my plate, the groundwork for all these endeavors is placed and my team has formed around me. My team has not been able to jump in full time because they are limited by their current employment. With your support, they could take this project full time and we can grow even quicker than anticipated. 

 

How will my support help Try Vegan?

With your support, we will be able to fulfill and meet all our needs so that we no longer have to worry about where the money will come from so that I can focus on what Try Vegan was created to do - Bring healthy sustainable plant based food to the people. Here are some ways your contribution will help with our company and expand the brand and awareness of veganism.

With proper funding, Try Vegan will be able to -

  • Purchase a commercial vacuum sealer enabling us to open up to the eastern seaboard
  • Allow us to have more days in the kitchen to work on meals and products
  • Get our own facility that we can certify as vegan and gluten free
  • Hire our team full time so we can start taking this show on the road
  • Hire a full time marketer to help promote and spread the message of the brand
  • Hire an assistant to focus on emails, updates websites, etc so that I can spend more time building the company
  • Have someone raise awareness of the 20% by 2020 campaign and take it to the next level
  • Increase advertising and spread knowledge of the vegan movement
  • Have more fun giveaways!
  • Allow us to give back and invest and support in other vegan start up brands 
  • Hire a crew full time to have the trucks out spreading awareness and bring vegan food to more people
  • Allow me to spend more time and energy focusing on building the brand not worrying where money will come from 

My whole goal with this project is to be able to secure funding while remaining as cost effective as possible im order to keep me as the individual owner to keep our costs as low as possible to pass the savings on to you. 

 

Goals

  • $25,000 -Purchase Commercial vacuum sealer
  • $35,000 - Lease or rent our own commercial space 
  • $45,000 -  Hire my kitchen and food truck team full time
  • $65, 000 - Purchase our own space
  • $75,000 - Hire someone full time to have trucks available 
  • $100,000 - Purchase Commercial facility 
  • $150,000 -  Concession stand at Barclay's Center
  • $175,000 - Hire Full Time Marketer, App Developer, and Clothing Designer
  • $200,000 - Start planning Try Vegan city tours
  • $250,000 - We will create a full fledged reality show based around this life and movement and shop it around to major content providers like netflix and amazon prime
  • $300,000 - Renovate and Restore George Washington's Old Eagle Tavern into a Vegan Cafe
  • $500,000+ - Ultimate Goal  Buy our own property to house trucks, have warehouse and kitchen facility, and create our own farm and animal sanctuary.  

 

Bonus Goals

 

Old Eagle Tavern 

Old Eagle Tavern is a pub in Trenton that has been closed for a number of years. It is owned by the City of Trenton and they are looking for someone to come in and revitalize the space. The amazing part about this building is that it is where President George Washington and the other founding fathers all hung out! It is still available in the city and I have been in contact with them about turning it into a  restaurant, cafe, yoga studio, and community center all in one. The first floor will offer a more formal dining experience with a larger menu while the second floor will have more of a cafe style layout where people can meet with friends, unwind, work on their laptops, etc. We will be able to revitalize the space while keeping the historic integrity of the building with our business model.

With your support we will be able to create this space to revitalize a beautiful building and a piece of world history while serving healthy organic vegan food to the area. 

 

Try Vegan® City Festivals

Try Vegan has attended a large number of festivals and we would like to begin planning our own events in different cities. It would be a food truck festival with cooking classes, yoga, culinary workshops, speakers, vendors, and many other unexpected surprises. 

 

Concession at Barclay's Center in Brooklyn 

For the past few months, I have had the idea to bring my mobile operation to indoor concessions at sporting arenas. The Barclay's Center in Brooklyn that hosts the Nets, Islanders, and a number of concerts and events throughout the year. After a number of conversations, they seem just as eager to have us at their facility as we are to be there. The only thing holding us back from being there is a lack of capital. 

With your support, we will be one of the first vegan companies be a food vendor at major league sports arenas!

 

ULTIMATE GOAL

If this project really and I mean REALLY takes off,  it will enable me to purchase my own plot of land and create Try Vegan HQ.  I would purchase a farm and build a commercial facility that we can certify vegan and gluten-free where we could produce all of our meals and products as well as a place to store the food trucks. I also plan on farming the land in order to ensure we are providing the highest quality produce while saving carbon emissions for transportation. Being vertically integrated would allow us to ensure quality every step of the way while maintaining the lowest cost possible. We would also create an animal sanctuary on the land to provide animals the life humans deserve to give them. 

 

Referral Program

 

We have also set up a Referral Program as a thank you for your support in sharing our project with others who you think would also like to help support us :)  

Be sure to be logged in when generating your link to receive credit

$500 - If you are within our delivery range, you will receive a complimentary week of meals. If you are outside of our meal delivery range, you will receive a $50 gift card to our online apparel store. 

$1000 - If you are within our delivery range, you will receive 2 weeks of complimentary meals. If you are outside of our meal delivery range, you will receive a $100 gift card to our online apparel store. 

$2500 - If you are within our delivery range, you will receive 1 month of complimentary meals. If you are outside of our meal delivery range, you will receive a $150 gift card to our online apparel store. 

$5000+ Wow, you must be a real influencer! Thank you for all of your support in getting the word out! Aside from 1 month of complimentary meals or a $250 gift card to our apparel store, I would love to have you as a guest on my podcast to share with the world what you are all about -I will be sure to reach out

 

Looking to help further? 

If you have any skills, talents, or think you would be a good fit for the Try Vegan team, feel free to send me an email Info@TryVeganLLC.com

What is Try Vegan®?
 
Try Vegan® started in 2014 as an idea to raise awareness for veganism through my passion for both sustainable change and business. I started by creating a business plan for a restaurant but quickly realized finding an investor to give me $250,000 in a niche that had not yet shown signs of life in my area was a tough sell. I was 26 at the time and living with my parents so I decided to take my savings and build my own food truck. I began by asking my neighbor if he knew anyone selling a truck and he told me he had not only one but two identical shuttle buses he was looking to sell. He gave them to me for a great price, and on May 16th 2015, I quit my job and spent the summer trying to figure out how to build a food truck from scratch in my parent's driveway.
On September 19th 2015, I had my first event in Trenton, NJ where Try Vegan did its first $650 in sales. It was not much, but it was a milestone that showed all my hard work had yielded a return, and more importantly, the truck I built actually passed a formal health inspection :).  Since then,  the business has evolved and expanded while remaining true to the original vision of bringing healthy vegan food to the people while also sharing knowledge and education about the impact a simple diet change can bring. The truck can always be found with a "Did You Know" banner showcasing the positive impact a vegan lifestyle can have to your overall health, the environment, and our future.
Try Vegan® comes from humble beginnings and has grand ambitions. Over the past 4 years, I have built two food trucks, a mobile app, multiple websites, a clothing line, Try Vegan TV, a podcast, and a meal prep delivery service.
The momentum of the market has has outpaced my finances and I need capital to keep up with the demand from the market. I want to keep Try Vegan® independent so that I can keep my costs as low as possible while remaining true to my vision without outside influence.
To learn more about Try Vegan® Visit Our Website
 
Try Vegan® Food Truck
The food truck has been the backbone of the operation and I have put my heart and soul into building it into what it is today. If you would have asked me 5 years ago what I wanted to do with my life, I would tell you I wanted to go to music festivals with my friends and teach people the benefits of a vegan lifestyle. Through finding my purpose and acting upon it, I have been able to manifest that dream and bring it into a reality by vending at some of the most iconic music festivals in the Northeast including Governor's Ball, Made in America, Moonrise, and Afropunk. Being able to provide food to people like me who used to be unable to find anything other than french fries has been incredibly rewarding. I truly understand how heartfelt and sincere their thank yous are because I was once in their shoes and have now become what I was looking for. 
I currently have one truck in operation while the other truck is in need of updated equipment and staffing. With proper capital, I will be able to equip the second truck and have the ability to pay someone to take it out full time to spread awareness and provide healthy vegan food to those who need it. 


To learn more about the truck visit Try Vegan Food Truck

This would allow us to have our own brick and mortar restaurant in the county with the highest demand. With your support, this could become a reality as soon as this winter! We would love to be able to have a space to call our own to serve you better, park our trucks, and have our own commercial kitchen. 
Your support would help us provide vegan food for those in Morris county where our services are in the highest demand
