story:
Who We Are

Welcome to the Mutt Hut Treat Truck Indiegogo Campaign! My name is Jennifer and my pawsome cohorts are Alfie & Baxter.  With my 20+ years of hospitality experience and love of baking I started the Mutt Hut Treat Truck in the NJ/NY Metropolitan area. The treats are handmade and crafted with premium natural ingredients. Many of you are familiar with the business. But if you're not please check out our Facebook,  Instagram and Website.

I've successfully launched the Mutt Hut in only a few months in 2018. It has been a surprise and pleasure that the truck and treats have been so well received. The big question I get on the truck is "Do you sell your treats online?". Currently, no. This is why we are asking for your help! I want to keep up the momentum and offer our amazing Gourmutt Barkery Treats online and nationwide. Your contribution will take us from the streets and into the online marketplace!

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to raise a minimum $18K in funds. Here is how the funds will be allocated:

  • Packaging Development
  • Label Requirements & Development (Nutrition Content, Guaranteed Analysis, Ingredient Statement)
  • Registering Product in ALL States (Example: New York State requires that EACH dog treat is registered with a $100 annual registration fee)
  • Create the Online Marketplace
  • Photography and other Professional Services
  • Professional Fees (Accountant, Lawyer)

TOTAL: A lot!!!

If we don't reach our financial goal here, we will source other funding to successfully launch the online marketplace.

If we go above and beyond our goal (um, that would be ahh-mazing!) the funds could do a number of things. Like, add better menu boards to the truck, extra shelving and storage, additional baking supplies, finance a new vehicle (the current one pulling the Mutt Hut is 14yrs old and near it's death) or build out a second truck!

PERKS

We tried to list a variety of THANKS and contribution levels in our perks list. For those of you that are pet parents and for those who are not. We've added perks for our international contributors who we can't ship our treats to.

The Impact

We know the pet industry is a large, profitable industry saturated with options. Our belief is there aren't enough Affordable, Exciting, Fun, Healthy and Tasty  treats (my dad's tried them too) on the market. We offer all different options of treats, sourced with human-grade ingredients.

  • Gluten- Free
  • Grain-Free
  • Lactose-Free
  • Vegan
  • Vegetarian

Other Ways You Can Help

Any level of support is appreciated. We've come up with some awesome incentives for those willing to donate. But if you can't help with a donation, please consider sharing this campaign and spreading the word.

I appreciate you all, and am endlessly grateful for all the support you've shown to this point so far! 

Thanks,

Jennifer and, of course, Alfie & Baxter...WOOF!
story_txt:
Who We Are
Welcome to the Mutt Hut Treat Truck Indiegogo Campaign! My name is Jennifer and my pawsome cohorts are Alfie & Baxter.  With my 20+ years of hospitality experience and love of baking I started the Mutt Hut Treat Truck in the NJ/NY Metropolitan area. The treats are handmade and crafted with premium natural ingredients. Many of you are familiar with the business. But if you're not please check out our Facebook,  Instagram and Website.
I've successfully launched the Mutt Hut in only a few months in 2018. It has been a surprise and pleasure that the truck and treats have been so well received. The big question I get on the truck is "Do you sell your treats online?". Currently, no. This is why we are asking for your help! I want to keep up the momentum and offer our amazing Gourmutt Barkery Treats online and nationwide. Your contribution will take us from the streets and into the online marketplace!

What We Need & What You Get
We are trying to raise a minimum $18K in funds. Here is how the funds will be allocated:

Packaging Development
Label Requirements & Development (Nutrition Content, Guaranteed Analysis, Ingredient Statement)
Registering Product in ALL States (Example: New York State requires that EACH dog treat is registered with a $100 annual registration fee)
Create the Online Marketplace
Photography and other Professional Services
Professional Fees (Accountant, Lawyer)

TOTAL: A lot!!!
If we don't reach our financial goal here, we will source other funding to successfully launch the online marketplace.
If we go above and beyond our goal (um, that would be ahh-mazing!) the funds could do a number of things. Like, add better menu boards to the truck, extra shelving and storage, additional baking supplies, finance a new vehicle (the current one pulling the Mutt Hut is 14yrs old and near it's death) or build out a second truck!
PERKS
We tried to list a variety of THANKS and contribution levels in our perks list. For those of you that are pet parents and for those who are not. We've added perks for our international contributors who we can't ship our treats to.

The Impact
We know the pet industry is a large, profitable industry saturated with options. Our belief is there aren't enough Affordable, Exciting, Fun, Healthy and Tasty  treats (my dad's tried them too) on the market. We offer all different options of treats, sourced with human-grade ingredients.

Gluten- Free
Grain-Free
Lactose-Free
Vegan
Vegetarian


Other Ways You Can Help
Any level of support is appreciated. We've come up with some awesome incentives for those willing to donate. But if you can't help with a donation, please consider sharing this campaign and spreading the word.
I appreciate you all, and am endlessly grateful for all the support you've shown to this point so far! 
Thanks,
Jennifer and, of course, Alfie & Baxter...WOOF!

story:
----

 

I (David) caught the coffee roasting 6 years ago and started Tropico Roast in 2015 to make good coffee at reasonable prices. In 2016, homeless encampments exploded around Los Angeles, and we decided to donate a portion of our profits to food banks across the city to help this crisis and around the country whenever natural disasters strike.
story_txt:
----
 
I (David) caught the coffee roasting 6 years ago and started Tropico Roast in 2015 to make good coffee at reasonable prices. In 2016, homeless encampments exploded around Los Angeles, and we decided to donate a portion of our profits to food banks across the city to help this crisis and around the country whenever natural disasters strike.

story:
WHAT IS IT?

Creamy, full-flavored ice cream, made with coconut-milk and other organic, natural ingredients & none of the 8 most common food allergens! Sold in dozens of grocery stores and restaurants across Michigan. Exceptional texture and flavor, none of the junk! 

*And sesame

WHY DO WE NEED OUR OWN KITCHEN SO BADLY? 

  • ALLERGY-FREE!
    Right now, we produce in a shared facility, which means we can’t control what other people bring into our kitchen and, as careful as we are, we cannot guarantee that there is no cross-contamination. AND THAT'S NOT GOOD ENOUGH! The money we raise in this campaign will go to our own, dedicated kitchen space where none of those 8 food allergens are allowed.  We want EVERYONE, regardless of food allergy or aversion, to confidently enjoy ice cream.
  • LOWER OUR PRICES!
    Our new space will allow us to increase our production volume and efficiency, which will lower our prices. This exceptional ice cream will be more accessible to more people!
  • TAKE OVER THE WORLD!
    Increased production volume will help us get our ice cream in your favorite local store, whether you live in Michigan, the Midwest, or anywhere in the country!

 

     

    *And sesame

    • ALL CREAMY, NO COMPROMISE — Exceptional texture, big bold flavor, no tummy ache! Your kids shouldn't have to settle for sub-par desserts at birthday parties, just because they have food allergies or can't digest it easily! 
    • NATURAL FLAVORS AND COLORS! We use plants for everything! They're magical. This is a treat you can trust!

    A safe, amazing ice cream! It is Ice Cream For Everyone™

       

      We Cannot Do This Alone

      We depend upon our community and customers every day to help us build our allergy-free facility  in order for us to grow and thrive. Your gift help us to provide a unique product to those who usually have to live without! 

       

       

      Other Ways You Can Help

      We understand that not everyone can give financially. If you are able to support us with love online and to your friends irl, we are grateful for that, as well! Please follow us on Instagram and Facebook and share this campaign! 

      Thank you!

story:
Hello everyone!

I would like to offer an abundance of tasty and health-filled snacks made with organic ingredients. Our packaging is environmentally friendly, too! No plastic! It is compostable and biodegradable. We are in the process of rolling out, "WOW, THAT'S NUTS!' made with organic nuts, roasted in plant-based organic oils and seasoned with Himalayan pink salt. We hope this will be the first in a long line of foods that are fun to eat and in a truly nutritious way!

HAPPY SNACKING!

story:
CROCK & ROLL MISSION
Rockin’ recipes slowed cooked and served to a rock-n-roll beat rollin’ through the streets of Las Vegas and beyond.
CROCK & ROLL VISION
Excelling in the food service industry, continually innovating, succeeding through determination and passion.

Short Summary

From the heart and soul of the founder:
Owning my own business has been my lifelong pursuit. My life experience has shown me that I love to cook, I love to bake, and I love to make people happy. I have often heard, “You have missed your calling,” when cooking or baking for an event, party or gathering, but to me, my “calling” just hadn’t started yet. My entrepreneurial heart craved freedom. The freedom to decide the who, the what, the when and the how. The freedom to create great food, play good music, make people laugh and provide a memorable experience. The freedom to achieve my lifelong vision. Over the years, ideas, concepts and plans came and went. In retrospect, it seemed as though the food truck “concept” kept rollin’ past me until it finally clicked for me…this would be a startup business that I could achieve and it was everything I loved to do. The research and planning began and showed that the food truck was an attainable and affordable way to kick start my future with an incredible amount of potential. Determining my niche in this industry took me through several iterations until I finally realized that the crock pot as a means of providing good, home-cooked meals for my growing and busy family was the answer. Seeing other moms at my kid’s soccer practice just as busy as I was, watching hordes of people lined up at the drive thru for a quick lunch or on their way home two hours after dinner time, and eavesdropping on conversations with friends and coworkers as they discuss their stress-filled lives. I could be a solution by providing really good food quick. The mobile food trailer with crock pot cooked entrees emerged as my “calling.”
Crock & Roll will serve hot sandwiches slow-cooked in a crock pot overnight and a different, made-from scratch cheesecake every day. The Crock & Roll food trailer will be “rockin” with rock-n-roll music and customers will order their sandwich favorite by name…literally. Our sandwiches will be named after ultra-famous rock-n-roll musicians…Ozzy Osbourne, Jimi Hendricks and Led Zeppelin, to name a few. With determination and a never-ending passion for good food and making mealtime fun, Crock & Roll WILL become a mainstay in Las Vegas…because “fast” food shouldn’t be boring.

With your help I will be able to complete the Crock & Roll trailer and create a legacy to live on through my children and grandchildren!

What We Need & What You Get

I love crock & roll
So put another dime in this jukebox, baby
I love crock n' roll
So come an' take your time an' dance with me

We are looking to raise $5,749 to partially cover the equipment(crock pots, refrigerator, oven/stove) we need to complete the mobile food trailer. We have purchased the 8.5' X 18' trailer equipped with a 100 amp panel with plugs, lighting and air conditioning, plumbing with 3 compartment sinks and handwashing sink, concession window with windows and screens and lastly the hood vent with a grease trap!

We have great gifts for all donors, large and small. We have our love and gratitude, the first ever Crock & Roll t-shirts, Crock & Roll entree's, Crock & Roll cheesecakes, special invites to a VIP party so you can put your dime in the jukebox and dance with me and of course signing your name on the Crock & Roll Wall of Fame because we could not have finished without you!!

If we don't reach our goal we will put everything into the equipment and put the rest on credit cards!!! We have already put in over $20,000 so its happening either way!!!

The Impact

Crock & Roll greets each customer “where they are.” As a mobile operation, Crock & Roll eliminates the inconvenience of travel for our customers by coming to them and provides a fast and easy way to eat allowing for a more relaxing lunch or dinner break. We are the solution for boring fast food lunches, hungry kids at the end of a busy day, or a drab, stale bag of popcorn at the soccer park.

After the first three years of operation, we plan to operationalize a second mobile food venture called “Lean With It” that serves an extreme health-conscious menu geared toward Generation Z, which will be introduced to the market during certain events like EDC, Burning Man and Life Is Beautiful through the Crock & Roll venue. Five year growth goals include multiple Crock & Roll food trucks in Nevada and the surrounding states.

Risks & Challenges

STRENGTHS
Industry:  One of the fastest growing industries today, no dominant companies nationwide, low start-up cost to enter industry

Market:  Medium sized market with huge potential for growth with the population of Las Vegas metro estimated at over 2M, year-round sales, ability to service city/county parks without additional permitting or licensure

Organizational:  Well-researched target market, understand core customer base, hyper-focused customer service, will and determination to win in a competitive environment, slow-cooked goodness, served fast!

WEAKNESSES                                                                                                                                            Industry:  Requirements to move, low start-up cost for competitors to enter industry

Market:  Summer heat

Organizational:  Unknown name/brand, lack of cash reserve during start-up period

OPPORTUNITIES                                                                                                                                         Industry:  Fast growing industry                                                                                                             

Market:  Diverse demographic/socio-economic population

Organizational:  Flexible working hours                                               

THREATS                                                                                                                                                      Industry:  Tightening governmental regulation

Market:  Increasing competition

Organizational:  Financial insecurity, nonguaranteed income

There is no restaurant, mobile or otherwise, serving the majority of its menu from a crock pot. That means for the Crock & Roll customer, a brand new food option is available to them that is healthier in preparation than most fast food and chain restaurants (without being completely vegetarian and/or vegan) and provides convenience and value for their dining out dollar. Crock & Roll can compete in this market with its unique product and exceptional service, its pricing model, and its ability to serve our customer without sacrificing profit margin.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to "put another dime in our jukebox baby" you can still make some music. By simply using the Indiegogo share tools and passing this campaign on to your friends and family you are helping considerably. Thanks!! 

We will, we will CROCK YOU! (sing it)  We will, we will CROCK YOU!

story:
• Mascot Monthly Mix (MMM) is a Japanese snack subscription box, curated by local mascot characters in order to showcase their different Japanese prefectures each month!
  • MMM comes with free shipping worldwide, and is available in MiniMix and MegaMix sizes. Both sizes include an original 8-page guidebook detailing the contents of the box, plus common allergy information; an assortment of unique local specialties from the prefecture being showcased (the curating Mascot of the Month's hometown), as well as other popular Japanese snacks and candies that the Mascot of the Month recommends; items from the mascot's personal stash (stickers, clear files, key chains, etc.); and MMM's signature item: a mascot themed postcard that you can send to the mascot and they'll write back!

 

(due to the ongoing Coronavirus situation, Japanese mascots currently aren't accepting overseas mail. We'll be implementing the 'writing to the mascot' aspect of our box after the Coronavirus situation settles).

 

  • The MegaMix box features an original design based on the curating Mascot of the Month, and contains double the candy and snacks of the MiniMix, including a unique drink and a DIY candy kit.

 

 

 

 

  • We work closely with each curating mascot character to ensure that their box is put together just right, and source as many of our snacks as possible from small businesses in their locality. We're starting off with only a few local items in each Mix, and we're committed to increasing the number as time goes on!
  • Our #1 goal is to give you an original experience that can be found nowhere else. A blend of reality and fantasy... a fun and informative taste-tour of a unique region in Japan with the help of a cute and quirky local!

 

 

A sneak peek of our upcoming November MegaMix, a taste-tour of Hokkaido Prefecture with the gun-toting pink deer, Momiji-chan. (some snacks will be changed)

 

 

Who is Mascot Monthly Mix?

Before we talk about ourselves, we think it's best to give you an idea of what exactly mascot characters are. 

Japanese mascots, known as yuru-kyara ( ゆるキャラ ), are cute and quirky characters that are popular throughout Japan! Mascots are a lot like us; they come in all sorts of sizes and colors, have ages and genders, likes and dislikes, and even hometowns that they love very much! Many mascots also have ridiculous talents, such as being able to  speak every language on Earth, or being a 0-year old fairy baby!

Official and unofficial mascots exist for all sorts of things in Japan, from brands and businesses, to events and activities, and even places; with the most popular mascots being treated like celebrities! 

 

 

Amabie, of the Sea; our September Mascot of the Month who is curating a taste-tour of their home, Kumamoto Prefecture

 

Now that you know who we're partnering with, here's a bit about us. We are a team of folks who live in Japan, lived in Japan, or just love Japan! We are crazy about Japanese culture and enjoy experiencing it any way that we can. In doing so, we've noticed two things: 

1. Most of the Japanese snack subscriptions out there just feature generic candy, with little in the way of actually experiencing the local flavors of Japan. 

2. Smaller Japanese prefectures are struggling to survive, and even though they have wonderful, unique experiences to offer not many people outside of Japan know about them. 

In creating Mascot Monthly Mix, we hope to satisfy these two needs, and who better to help us than a local? Working hand in hand with quirky, locally-based mascot characters, we want to give you a taste of what their localities have to offer: an experience unlike any other!

 

What's inside of each MMM?

Each MMM comes with an original 8-page guidebook that includes an introduction to the Mascot of the Month and their locality, fun tidbits of information and Japanese learning, and information about the snacks featured inside the Mix -as well as common allergy information. Each MMM is packed with local specialties sourced from small businesses in the mascot's hometown (many of which are difficult to find outside of their region... even in Japan!), as well as original Mascot of the Month items (including our signature item: an original mascot themed postcard!), and popular Japanese snacks and candies that the mascot themselves recommend.

 

 

Pages from our September 2020 Kumamoto Prefecture guidebook, included in each Mix

 

 

Our original Amabie themed postcard, included in every September MiniMix and MegaMix

 

 

Mascot Monthly Mix is available in two sizes: MiniMix and MegaMix

  • MiniMix includes 10-12 items: 1 original 8-page guidebook, at least 3 local specialties, at least 5 popular snacks and candies, and at least 2 original items from the mascot's personal stash (decal sticker and themed postcard). This is the box for people who want to sample of what MMM is all about. 

 

 

MiniMix

 

 

 

 

MegaMix includes 20-25 items: 1 original 8-page guidebook, 1 unique drink, at least 5 local specialties, 10 popular snacks and candies, 1 DIY candy kit, and 3 original items from the mascot's personal stash (decal sticker and themed postcard + clear file, keychain, additional sticker, etc.). Each month's box features a new original design based on the Mascot of the Month. This is the definitive MMM experience! 

 

 

September 2020 MegaMix

 

 

Indiegogo Rewards

By supporting our Indiegogo campaign, you'll also be getting some awesome rewards! Backers at any of our MegaMix tiers will receive an Indiegogo exclusive Amabie pattern face mask. Share some of the unique flavors of Japan, while helping us reach our funding goal!

 

 

$5 - Limited edition KitKats + Original mascot-themed Japanese learning card

 

 

$10 - 2 limited edition KitKats + original Mascot-themed Japanese learning card + original September mascot curator (Amabie) post card

 

 

$15 - 1 bag limited edition KitKats + original mascot-themed Japanese learning card + original September Mascot of the Month (Amabie) post card

 

 

Indiegogo exclusive Amabie pattern mask (included as a reward with each MegaMix tier)

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

$2,500- Every MiniMix and MegaMix now comes with an additional Mascot Stash sticker

 

 

Original Amabie decal sticker, currently included in each September 2020 MegaMix and MiniMix. Stretchgoal sticker will feature a different design

 

 

$3,000- Guidebook will now be larger (12 pages instead of 8! More mascot and prefecture related content)

$3,500- ???

$4,000- An additional Mascot Stash item will now be included in each Megamix

$5,000- ???

$6,000- All backers at any of the MiniMix or MegaMix levels will receive a code for 1 free item from our marketplace, at a later time when our marketplace is up. 

$8,000- Mascot Mix items will now include larger things like T-shirts, plushies, socks, etc.  

 

Risks and challenges

Our team is made up of a number of very talented people with just the right skill-sets to make this a reality. Some of us live in Japan, some of us live outside of Japan, but we all love Japan, and we're sure the same goes for you! We've never done a project of this scale before, but what we've accomplished thus far gives us confidence that we can deliver. In light of the current Coronavirus situation, shipping may be delayed. Please know we'll do our best to get you your Mix as quickly as possible!

If you have any questions, or anything at all that you talk about it (we mean it!) please send us a message us on our Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter. We want to make sure you have as much confidence in this project as we do!

 (due to the ongoing Coronavirus situation, Japanese mascots currently aren't accepting overseas mail. We'll be implementing the 'writing to the mascot' aspect of our box after the Coronavirus situation settles). The MegaMix box features an original design based on the curating Mascot of the Month, and contains double the candy and snacks of the MiniMix, including a unique drink and a DIY candy kit.    
We work closely with each curating mascot character to ensure that their box is put together just right, and source as many of our snacks as possible from small businesses in their locality. We're starting off with only a few local items in each Mix, and we're committed to increasing the number as time goes on!
Our #1 goal is to give you an original experience that can be found nowhere else. A blend of reality and fantasy... a fun and informative taste-tour of a unique region in Japan with the help of a cute and quirky local!
  A sneak peek of our upcoming November MegaMix, a taste-tour of Hokkaido Prefecture with the gun-toting pink deer, Momiji-chan. (some snacks will be changed)  Who is Mascot Monthly Mix?Before we talk about ourselves, we think it's best to give you an idea of what exactly mascot characters are. Japanese mascots, known as yuru-kyara ( ゆるキャラ ), are cute and quirky characters that are popular throughout Japan! Mascots are a lot like us; they come in all sorts of sizes and colors, have ages and genders, likes and dislikes, and even hometowns that they love very much! Many mascots also have ridiculous talents, such as being able to  speak every language on Earth, or being a 0-year old fairy baby!Official and unofficial mascots exist for all sorts of things in Japan, from brands and businesses, to events and activities, and even places; with the most popular mascots being treated like celebrities!   Amabie, of the Sea; our September Mascot of the Month who is curating a taste-tour of their home, Kumamoto Prefecture Now that you know who we're partnering with, here's a bit about us. We are a team of folks who live in Japan, lived in Japan, or just love Japan! We are crazy about Japanese culture and enjoy experiencing it any way that we can. In doing so, we've noticed two things: 1. Most of the Japanese snack subscriptions out there just feature generic candy, with little in the way of actually experiencing the local flavors of Japan. 2. Smaller Japanese prefectures are struggling to survive, and even though they have wonderful, unique experiences to offer not many people outside of Japan know about them. In creating Mascot Monthly Mix, we hope to satisfy these two needs, and who better to help us than a local? Working hand in hand with quirky, locally-based mascot characters, we want to give you a taste of what their localities have to offer: an experience unlike any other! What's inside of each MMM?Each MMM comes with an original 8-page guidebook that includes an introduction to the Mascot of the Month and their locality, fun tidbits of information and Japanese learning, and information about the snacks featured inside the Mix -as well as common allergy information. Each MMM is packed with local specialties sourced from small businesses in the mascot's hometown (many of which are difficult to find outside of their region... even in Japan!), as well as original Mascot of the Month items (including our signature item: an original mascot themed postcard!), and popular Japanese snacks and candies that the mascot themselves recommend.  Pages from our September 2020 Kumamoto Prefecture guidebook, included in each Mix  Our original Amabie themed postcard, included in every September MiniMix and MegaMix  Mascot Monthly Mix is available in two sizes: MiniMix and MegaMixMiniMix includes 10-12 items: 1 original 8-page guidebook, at least 3 local specialties, at least 5 popular snacks and candies, and at least 2 original items from the mascot's personal stash (decal sticker and themed postcard). This is the box for people who want to sample of what MMM is all about.   MiniMix    MegaMix includes 20-25 items: 1 original 8-page guidebook, 1 unique drink, at least 5 local specialties, 10 popular snacks and candies, 1 DIY candy kit, and 3 original items from the mascot's personal stash (decal sticker and themed postcard + clear file, keychain, additional sticker, etc.). Each month's box features a new original design based on the Mascot of the Month. This is the definitive MMM experience!   September 2020 MegaMix  Indiegogo RewardsBy supporting our Indiegogo campaign, you'll also be getting some awesome rewards! Backers at any of our MegaMix tiers will receive an Indiegogo exclusive Amabie pattern face mask. Share some of the unique flavors of Japan, while helping us reach our funding goal!  $5 - Limited edition KitKats + Original mascot-themed Japanese learning card  $10 - 2 limited edition KitKats + original Mascot-themed Japanese learning card + original September mascot curator (Amabie) post card  $15 - 1 bag limited edition KitKats + original mascot-themed Japanese learning card + original September Mascot of the Month (Amabie) post card  Indiegogo exclusive Amabie pattern mask (included as a reward with each MegaMix tier)  STRETCH GOALS$2,500- Every MiniMix and MegaMix now comes with an additional Mascot Stash sticker  Original Amabie decal sticker, currently included in each September 2020 MegaMix and MiniMix. Stretchgoal sticker will feature a different design  $3,000- Guidebook will now be larger (12 pages instead of 8! More mascot and prefecture related content)$3,500- ???$4,000- An additional Mascot Stash item will now be included in each Megamix$5,000- ???$6,000- All backers at any of the MiniMix or MegaMix levels will receive a code for 1 free item from our marketplace, at a later time when our marketplace is up. $8,000- Mascot Mix items will now include larger things like T-shirts, plushies, socks, etc.   Risks and challengesOur team is made up of a number of very talented people with just the right skill-sets to make this a reality. Some of us live in Japan, some of us live outside of Japan, but we all love Japan, and we're sure the same goes for you! We've never done a project of this scale before, but what we've accomplished thus far gives us confidence that we can deliver. In light of the current Coronavirus situation, shipping may be delayed. Please know we'll do our best to get you your Mix as quickly as possible!If you have any questions, or anything at all that you talk about it (we mean it!) please send us a message us on our Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter. We want to make sure you have as much confidence in this project as we do!

story:
RBar Protein - with concentrated ALMOND PROTEIN - is Here!

The same reason we created our RBar Energy bars 10 years ago is why we have now developed a protein bar that is unlike any you have tried. RBar Protein Bars deliver 10g of protein or more in each of the five new flavors, including Matcha Orange, Pomegranate, Coconut, Acai, and Honey Nut.

They are full of concentrated ALMOND PROTEIN, giving them a smooth, creamy texture that avoids the off-putting sticky or chalky consistency of other protein bars. RBar Protein Bars are the perfect choice for a protein-packed breakfast, post-workout recovery, any time snacks or meal replacements. All five flavors are plant-based, paleo, non-GMO, and gluten-free with no dairy, whey, hemp, egg, or soy protein.

We believe in helping you achieve more with less. That's why all of our products have seven all-natural ingredients or less and contain only the highest grade ingredients, natural fruits, and no artificial additives. Unlike most protein bars on the market today, RBar Protein Bars focus on simplicity to ensure the best tasting product from the fewest ingredients possible.

How We Got Here

Ten years ago, I had a problem with the available energy goo’s, bars, and other commercially available options for sustainable energy during my cycling training and races. So I decided to create my own energy bar made of only the best ingredients that live up to my belief that simple is better.

I started in my kitchen handcrafting energy bars with just a food processor and a handful of items from my grocery store produce section—nuts, fruits, superfoods— and lots of muscle.

They caught on right away with my cycling buddies, endurance athletes, and people looking for a simple snack to keep them going. The audience and love for RBar Energy have grown over the years as parents, students, and working adults quickly adopted this alternative healthy snack to help them feed their pursuits.
 

"These are my favorite snack bars! So much better than Larabars and RxBars in my opinion. Not too chewy or mushy. I love all the flavors and the fact that they are made from just a few simple ingredients." - Kara W.

 

We Need Your Support

We know the new RBar Protein Bars will be a big hit with all of you who already love RBar and have supported us for the last ten years. THANK YOU! 

Now we need your help to bring RBar Protein Bars to the world. We have moved out of the kitchen and now manufacture our products at a state of the art facility. But manufacturing requires a substantial investment, and we need your help to create the large scale production runs needed to bring RBar Protein Bars to everyone. 

By becoming a backer at any level, you get us closer to that goal. In return for your support, you will receive the largest discounts we can manage, and most of these offers will only be available this one time. 

To the oh so many who already love RBar Energy Bars, thank you!  We know you will love our protein bars. Are you ready to #FeedYourPursuit? 

Thank you for supporting us little guys in a world of corporate behemoths. We can't do it out you. 

- Brian Cornelius

RBar Founder

 

Ingredients and Nutritional Information

See updates!

story:
Grand Rising Family,

My name is Bria Hutson. I am a young, ambitious, innovative black woman, mother, and business leader, with a purpose of Healing the HOOD though food and education. I am the Founder and CEO of Ju’C Fruits. Ju’C Fruits is a Fresh plant-based food, drink, and snack product line that is providing SUSTAINBLE FOOD OPTIONS (RAW, Vegan, & Alkaline) to communities that have historically been deprived and denied access to Whole Plant-based food options. 

Growing up in Deep East Oakland made me who I am today and every day I am advocating for the REPLENISHMENT of my community! After having my children, I began to realize that my community is a Food Desert. In 2017, when  I transitioned to a plant-based lifestyle, this issue became more apparent. Frustrated by the absence of Plant-based  in the Hood, I was inspired to create Ju’C Fruits to not only solve this issue, but to also advocate for Food Justice and Food Equity. 


We are going into communities that are considered Food Deserts such as Deep East Oakland and surrounding areas and REVITALIZING them by establishing culturally inclusive food systems that Embody Food Justice and Food Equity. We are unique!  We  do not use any artificial ingredients (colors, flavor, sugars, or sweeteners) and we are food allegry friendly (Soy-Free, Nut-Free, and offer Gluten Free options).

We know the importance of our Black culture,Black heritage, and Black greatness being reflected in our menu and within the plant-based industry. Therefore, we cook with different spice and herbs to not only please the palates of our clients, but to also maximize the nutritional value of the products that we serve our community. We are community oriented and we pride ourselves on creating a luxury experience of our clients. We practice the FARM to TABLE standard, which means we support local farmers.

We love and respect Mama Earth and our products reflect our passion. We believe that Plant based living is Black, is HOOD, is LIFE. Thus, we are bringing a NEW LOOK, NEW STYLE, and NEW TASTE to Healthy. It is our mission to provide our community with CONVENIENT ACCESS to delicious healthy alternatives for artificial fruits drinks, snacks, and processed fast foods.

Ju'C Fruits is community-driven, and it is our goal to practice the Triple Bottom line standard. I have structured Ju'C Fruits to not only provide delicious healthy plant-based food to the hood, but to also UPLIFT people individually and collectively through education and given back to the community. Our model is to Introduce, Educate, Teach, and Transform.  We are Re-educating and Re-connecting the Hood to a healthier lifestyle one Food Desert at a time. ​

It's has been a long time coming, I started Ju'C Fruits back in 2018 with limited resources. I have been boot strapping to build my brand; however, I am proud to announce that I have secured a phyiscal location and I plan to open very soon.  This is a blessing, it is a huge transition, but I need financial support to better serve my community, healthier foods options.

Your contribution will help me to pay for more time in the commercial kitchen, purchase commercial grade equipment, and hire at least 2-3 team members ASAP. This money will help me to operate more efficiently and increase our production, to better meet our current demand.  I will use this funding to: 

1. Create Jobs within our community. I have to Build a solid team. I need to hire at least 2-3 team members ASAP. I need to hire help for production, retail, and delivery. I plan to hire youth from within my community to give them needed customer service experience. I also want to hire women and men who are re-entering into society, because they are typically disenfranchised from the workforce, and find it challenging to secure Sustainable employment that helps them on their new journey.

- Wages for part-time / fulltime ($17-$20 per hr.) living in the Bay Area is expensive, so I would like to pay my team more than the $15 minimum wage.

- Part-time Staff wages:($18.5*20hrs) x (4 weeks) = $1,480 per Part-time emplyee/per month

- Full-time Staff wages:($18.5*40hrs) x (4 weeks) = $2,960 per Full-time emplyee/per month

2. Purchase Commercial Grade Equipment:

-Good Nature X-1 Cold Press Juice Machine ( $27,000) will increase our fresh press juice yield from 2 gallon per hour to 20-40 gallon per hour. This machine is NSF Certified and can be use to make all of beverages (Juices, Elixirs, and Hemp Lattes). This machine is made in the USA.

- MiniPack MVS 45-XP11 Commercial Vacuum Sealer ($4,395) will help to naturally preserve our fresh pressed juice and help to lock in its nutrients, by removing any excess air in the glass jars . This is Vacuum sealer is  important because it will reduce the OXIDATION, which is essential for large batch production.

- AP362 Label Applicator ($1,595): will help us to seamlessly apply labels to our glass bottles and increase our productivity. 

3. Funds will help pay for more Commercial Kitchen time and space. Currently, we are using Dig Deep Food Hub as our commissary kitchen to produce our product.  The current cost in $24/hr. per station. Because we will be opening a Kiosk location, we still must use the kitchen to make majority of our products. We will be reserving the commissary kitchen at least 20/hr. week (using 2 workstation).

-  Commissary Kitchen Rental: 2(24*15) =2,880 

- Storage $200/ month

- Total is approx. $3,080/ month for Commissary

We understand that our country is experiencing a difficult time; if I don't reach my $60,000, I will use the money raised to pay for our immediate needs: hiring staff and securing more commissary kitchen time.

Ju’C Fruits is an Essential business. Food is a necessity.  Healthy Food options are not only needed to solve our communities FOOD DESERT ISSUE, but to also heal our mind, body, and soul. It is our born right to have convenient access to organic produce, fresh press juice, gourmet salads, healing smoothies, and whole plant-based foods. Ju'C Fruits is taking a stand and the initiative to pioneer needed change. Thus, if you decide to support me, you are investing in the upward mobility of our community and Healing the Hood one Food Desert at a time.

As I stated previously, it’s has been a long time coming, I started Ju'C Fruits back in 2018 with limited resources. I understand that there will always be challenges; however, I have come too far to give up! I know that obstacles are  opportunities to  grow. I will continue to invest 110%. I am not where I started two years ago, and my goal is to continuously advance. 

There is no minimum contribution,  no amount is too small, every penny counts. If you are not able to contribute, I ask that you please share and spread our story.  Please share this link and please share our story. I greatly appreciate it!

We Appreciate You!

We Value Your Existence!

Much Love and Many Blessings!

story:
Black Crown Hot Sauce - The rarest hot sauce in the world.

"Antigua Black Pineapple & Scotch Bonnet Hot Sauce"

A distinctive hot sauce made with one of the rarest tropical fruits in the world - The renowned Antigua Black Pineapple.  Once paired with rip roaring scotch bonnet peppers this fiery Hot Sauce brightens up every dish with bold heat and deep island flavor.

 

The palate is awakened with this exotic fruit and the hot sauce developed from the unique blend is sublime.  A one of a kind hot sauce in a class of it’s own. Imagine capturing that hot spicy island vacation in a bottle without leaving your couch. Elevate your pantry game with this rare spicy & sweet hot pepper sauce perfect for every meal you prepare or the one’s you order in. Currently this fruit is produced in considerably small quantities in contrast to it's demand therefore this is an extremely limited release and only a specific amount of bottles will be produced for this project.

 

 

Quotes from people who have tasted Black Crown Hot Sauce for the first time:

 

"Wow how did you get the pineapple in there?! This might be your best hot sauce ever"

 

"This is truly special, it has such an amazing burst of flavor and the heat is on point! "

 

"We put it on everything, my husband finished the bottle in a week."

 

"You need to make more, please tell me you're going to make more!"

 

"I need a larger bottle. Can you do a gallon?!"

 

 

An island vacation in a bottle!

This brand new hot pepper sauce from Bacchanal  Sauce is uniquely crafted for connoisseurs of wonderful food secrets and exceptional flavor. A fiery island treasure for home cooks and those who just like to revel in  heat and flavor. Let Black Crown Hot Sauce inspire your every dish because we know you deserve the very best.

 

Island Tings!

Hi guys my name is Sonya and I’m the owner at Bacchanal Sauce. A Brooklyn based company that focuses on distinctive Caribbean flavor with a kick! Our brand new hot sauce , the Black Crown Hot Sauce was born on a  recent trip back to Antigua and Barbuda where a visit to the Cades Bay Agriculture center uncovered the flavor & beauty of the Antigua Black Pineapple. I remembered  the taste of that uncommonly sweet and crisp pineapple from childhood and wanted to revisit it. As soon as we bit into the fruit there was a burst of wonderful flavor that immediately inspired this royal hot sauce. Once the sauce was created, adding in hot sun ripened scotch bonnet peppers, notes of ginger, onion, garlic, raw cane sugar, allspice and other wonderful ingredients we knew we had a rare gem on our hands.

“...yet a memory cannot be trusted, for so much of the experience of the past is determined by the experience of the present.”

― Jamaica Kincaid

The Antigua Black Pineapple first harvested by the Arawaks is said to be ‘the world’s sweetest,’ pineapple with a unique flavor. It belongs to the “Queen” group of pineapples, growing primarily on the southwest coast of Antigua- a tropical gem in the Caribbean. This uniquely regal fruit with it’s luscious sweet pulp makes this hot sauce explode with rich fiery flavor. 

 

Above: Local farmer & Antigua Black Pineapple advocate

(Local Antigua Black Pineapple & Mango Farmer- he moved to Antigua over 30 years ago and the Antigua Black Pineapple captured his imagination, he now calls Antigua home and is one of the three main farmers who champion the crop)

                                                            

 

Our philosophy of using fresh ethically sourced ingredients to create complex exotic tropical flavor rings true whether in Brooklyn or the shores of the Caribbean. Each bottle is handcrafted and made in small batches to ensure the most intense flavors are captured and preserved.

Get Sauced! 

Perfect to season your pot or add to each meal for Hot island flavor. Imagine breakfast eggs, soups, tacos, tofu scrambles, saltfish cakes, grilled vegetables & seafood all taken to higher heights with a new depth of deep spicy flavor.

About

Bacchanal Sauce is the brainchild of a Brooklyn girl with Caribbean roots. It started with one pepper seed of an idea – what if there was  a hot sauce that wasn’t just about heat for the sake of it, but about delicious Caribbean flavor and the perfect island kick?  A hot sauce that pepper heads and the average home cooks could use on everything without choosing between heat and flavor. That was the start of Bacchanal Sauce crafting fiery condiments with exotic tropical ingredients. The company has now expanded to include a unique fast-casual Caribbean restaurant concept along with one of a kind pop up food experiences.

Following the pepper and her Caribbean spiked palate Chef Sonya Samuel started Bacchanal Sauce to highlight the taste, excitement, and revelry of a hot Caribbean fête in the form of tropical island condiments & unique Caribbean food experiences! Sonya’s goal is always to share the buoyant richness of Caribbean culture both in the islands and in her Brooklyn & New York community where Caribbean sights and sounds have become wonderfully woven into the New York cultural fabric.

“…she believes in food: that good food should create memories and moments. It should “transport” you.  And, you know what, I’ll give it to her. This pepper sauce is like a nice, spicy vacation.”—Food Curated

*Our restaurant pop up food experiences in New York have come to a halt due to the current pandemic however we’ve decided to streamline our focus to our online site which features our Hot Sauce’s and rotating seasonal exotic jams and jellies. That is why it’s imperative that everyone has a chance to explore these wonderful Caribbean condiment experiences right at home*

What We Need & What You Get

The purpose of this campaign is to deliver this rare small batch Black Crown Hot Sauce right to your doorstep. Hold in your hands not just a Hot Sauce but a unique piece of history. We want to make sure that hot sauce lovers and home cooks everywhere get to really wow their taste buds and have amazing fun in the kitchen cooking and grooving to that island beat. 

With our commitment to hot island flavor we are focused on:

1. Delivering to all our amazing backers the rarest Hot Sauce in the world - Black Crown Hot Sauce along with super cool Bacchanal Sauce swag.

2. Truly broaden and grow our online presence.  It’s imperative that more people get to taste Black Crown Hot Sauce and everything Bacchanal Sauce has to offer.  We’re passionate about Caribbean food, ingredients, and flavor and truly want to target online sales directly through our website and online presence. The campaign will also allow us to focus on marketing and improving our digital platforms.

Breakdown on how funds will be used:

* Secure production and fulfillment for this limited Hot Sauce run.

* Pay farmers for the Antiguan Black Pineapple and scotch bonnet peppers in Antigua along with wholesale U.S producers for other ingredients.

* Ensure manpower and capacity to produce the Sauce.

*Packaging, Labeling and Shipping of the product and swag

*Broaden marketing reach

Rewards

Everyone loves a little something special.

Get our $100 reward and receive our brand new Spicy Tamarind Sauce as an exclusive reward. Some customers have dubbed it our best Sauce yet. If you love tart, sweet and spicy with a distinctive umami flavor don’t miss out on this perk!

 

The Impact

Your contribution will not only make sure you have the rarest Hot Sauce in the world in your hands but it will allow a small business to continue to grow in uncertain times and make a far reaching impact on both U.S agri wholesalers and Caribbean Farmers thus making a huge contribution to agricultural endeavors

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to get Black Crown Hot Sauce on every table in a little over two months after the campaign. However if the demand exceeds expectations we will have to look at our initial forecast and make adjustments regarding delivery time-frames. We know far too well about challenges as the start of Covid-19 and having our production facility closed caused month long delays. We've dealt with challenges especially at the start of this pandemic which made us have to put our sauces on back-order for the first time. While difficult it forced us to onboard a third party shipping facility to make sure that items arrive on time and in great shape.

We’ve partnered with a reputable fulfillment company and will start production with stringent food service measures to ensure every bottle of Black Crown Hot Sauce is perfect. Our years of Hot Sauce & food production will ensure that your items arrive to you as intended. However if we do not reach our target we won’t be able to start production.Thank you for your understanding and continued love & support.

Other Ways You Can Help

Remember you can give a likkle island love to this campaign by sharing it with friends and family via Twitter, Facebook and Instagram ❤️
story_txt:
Black Crown Hot Sauce - The rarest hot sauce in the world.
"Antigua Black Pineapple & Scotch Bonnet Hot Sauce"

A distinctive hot sauce made with one of the rarest tropical fruits in the world - The renowned Antigua Black Pineapple.  Once paired with rip roaring scotch bonnet peppers this fiery Hot Sauce brightens up every dish with bold heat and deep island flavor.
 
The palate is awakened with this exotic fruit and the hot sauce developed from the unique blend is sublime.  A one of a kind hot sauce in a class of it’s own. Imagine capturing that hot spicy island vacation in a bottle without leaving your couch. Elevate your pantry game with this rare spicy & sweet hot pepper sauce perfect for every meal you prepare or the one’s you order in. Currently this fruit is produced in considerably small quantities in contrast to it's demand therefore this is an extremely limited release and only a specific amount of bottles will be produced for this project.
 

 
Quotes from people who have tasted Black Crown Hot Sauce for the first time:
 
"Wow how did you get the pineapple in there?! This might be your best hot sauce ever"
 
"This is truly special, it has such an amazing burst of flavor and the heat is on point! "
 
"We put it on everything, my husband finished the bottle in a week."
 
"You need to make more, please tell me you're going to make more!"
 
"I need a larger bottle. Can you do a gallon?!"
 


 An island vacation in a bottle!This brand new hot pepper sauce from Bacchanal  Sauce is uniquely crafted for connoisseurs of wonderful food secrets and exceptional flavor. A fiery island treasure for home cooks and those who just like to revel in  heat and flavor. Let Black Crown Hot Sauce inspire your every dish because we know you deserve the very best. Island Tings!Hi guys my name is Sonya and I’m the owner at Bacchanal Sauce. A Brooklyn based company that focuses on distinctive Caribbean flavor with a kick! Our brand new hot sauce , the Black Crown Hot Sauce was born on a  recent trip back to Antigua and Barbuda where a visit to the Cades Bay Agriculture center uncovered the flavor & beauty of the Antigua Black Pineapple. I remembered  the taste of that uncommonly sweet and crisp pineapple from childhood and wanted to revisit it. As soon as we bit into the fruit there was a burst of wonderful flavor that immediately inspired this royal hot sauce. Once the sauce was created, adding in hot sun ripened scotch bonnet peppers, notes of ginger, onion, garlic, raw cane sugar, allspice and other wonderful ingredients we knew we had a rare gem on our hands.“...yet a memory cannot be trusted, for so much of the experience of the past is determined by the experience of the present.”― Jamaica KincaidThe Antigua Black Pineapple first harvested by the Arawaks is said to be ‘the world’s sweetest,’ pineapple with a unique flavor. It belongs to the “Queen” group of pineapples, growing primarily on the southwest coast of Antigua- a tropical gem in the Caribbean. This uniquely regal fruit with it’s luscious sweet pulp makes this hot sauce explode with rich fiery flavor.  Above: Local farmer & Antigua Black Pineapple advocate(Local Antigua Black Pineapple & Mango Farmer- he moved to Antigua over 30 years ago and the Antigua Black Pineapple captured his imagination, he now calls Antigua home and is one of the three main farmers who champion the crop)
                                                            

 
Our philosophy of using fresh ethically sourced ingredients to create complex exotic tropical flavor rings true whether in Brooklyn or the shores of the Caribbean. Each bottle is handcrafted and made in small batches to ensure the most intense flavors are captured and preserved.Get Sauced! Perfect to season your pot or add to each meal for Hot island flavor. Imagine breakfast eggs, soups, tacos, tofu scrambles, saltfish cakes, grilled vegetables & seafood all taken to higher heights with a new depth of deep spicy flavor.AboutBacchanal Sauce is the brainchild of a Brooklyn girl with Caribbean roots. It started with one pepper seed of an idea – what if there was  a hot sauce that wasn’t just about heat for the sake of it, but about delicious Caribbean flavor and the perfect island kick?  A hot sauce that pepper heads and the average home cooks could use on everything without choosing between heat and flavor. That was the start of Bacchanal Sauce crafting fiery condiments with exotic tropical ingredients. The company has now expanded to include a unique fast-casual Caribbean restaurant concept along with one of a kind pop up food experiences.Following the pepper and her Caribbean spiked palate Chef Sonya Samuel started Bacchanal Sauce to highlight the taste, excitement, and revelry of a hot Caribbean fête in the form of tropical island condiments & unique Caribbean food experiences! Sonya’s goal is always to share the buoyant richness of Caribbean culture both in the islands and in her Brooklyn & New York community where Caribbean sights and sounds have become wonderfully woven into the New York cultural fabric.“…she believes in food: that good food should create memories and moments. It should “transport” you.  And, you know what, I’ll give it to her. This pepper sauce is like a nice, spicy vacation.”—Food Curated*Our restaurant pop up food experiences in New York have come to a halt due to the current pandemic however we’ve decided to streamline our focus to our online site which features our Hot Sauce’s and rotating seasonal exotic jams and jellies. That is why it’s imperative that everyone has a chance to explore these wonderful Caribbean condiment experiences right at home*What We Need & What You GetThe purpose of this campaign is to deliver this rare small batch Black Crown Hot Sauce right to your doorstep. Hold in your hands not just a Hot Sauce but a unique piece of history. We want to make sure that hot sauce lovers and home cooks everywhere get to really wow their taste buds and have amazing fun in the kitchen cooking and grooving to that island beat. With our commitment to hot island flavor we are focused on:1. Delivering to all our amazing backers the rarest Hot Sauce in the world - Black Crown Hot Sauce along with super cool Bacchanal Sauce swag.2. Truly broaden and grow our online presence.  It’s imperative that more people get to taste Black Crown Hot Sauce and everything Bacchanal Sauce has to offer.  We’re passionate about Caribbean food, ingredients, and flavor and truly want to target online sales directly through our website and online presence. The campaign will also allow us to focus on marketing and improving our digital platforms.Breakdown on how funds will be used:* Secure production and fulfillment for this limited Hot Sauce run.* Pay farmers for the Antiguan Black Pineapple and scotch bonnet peppers in Antigua along with wholesale U.S producers for other ingredients.* Ensure manpower and capacity to produce the Sauce.*Packaging, Labeling and Shipping of the product and swag*Broaden marketing reachRewardsEveryone loves a little something special.Get our $100 reward and receive our brand new Spicy Tamarind Sauce as an exclusive reward. Some customers have dubbed it our best Sauce yet. If you love tart, sweet and spicy with a distinctive umami flavor don’t miss out on this perk! The ImpactYour contribution will not only make sure you have the rarest Hot Sauce in the world in your hands but it will allow a small business to continue to grow in uncertain times and make a far reaching impact on both U.S agri wholesalers and Caribbean Farmers thus making a huge contribution to agricultural endeavors
Risks & Challenges
Our goal is to get Black Crown Hot Sauce on every table in a little over two months after the campaign. However if the demand exceeds expectations we will have to look at our initial forecast and make adjustments regarding delivery time-frames. We know far too well about challenges as the start of Covid-19 and having our production facility closed caused month long delays. We've dealt with challenges especially at the start of this pandemic which made us have to put our sauces on back-order for the first time. While difficult it forced us to onboard a third party shipping facility to make sure that items arrive on time and in great shape.
We’ve partnered with a reputable fulfillment company and will start production with stringent food service measures to ensure every bottle of Black Crown Hot Sauce is perfect. Our years of Hot Sauce & food production will ensure that your items arrive to you as intended. However if we do not reach our target we won’t be able to start production.Thank you for your understanding and continued love & support.
Other Ways You Can Help
Remember you can give a likkle island love to this campaign by sharing it with friends and family via Twitter, Facebook and Instagram ❤️

story:
Short Summary

We’re Elspeth and Joe, a certified holistic health coach & vegan chef, and a vegan fitness coach & entrepreneur. Vegan Plan is helping people improve their health and the health of the planet through making it easy to thrive on a Vegan diet.

After six years of cheffing, coaching and catering for countless people, we found that most people spend more than three hours per week shopping, planning their recipes and preparing meals. 

We created Vegan Plan to help people eat delicious vegan food that's easy to prepare and free-from stress. Lots of people want to test or transition over to a vegan diet but don’t know where to begin. We’ve learned people need a plan to help them get started on their vegan journey. 

That’s why we created Vegan Plan!

Vegan Plan makes preparing healthy, vegan meals easy. Our plan delivers you a personalised weekly vegan meal plan, step by step recipes and shopping lists every week. We’re here to guide you, step-by-step to select ingredients and prepare recipes so you don't have to worry about what to cook. Every recipe is chef tested, highly nutritious, and can be adjusted for your preferences.  We do all the planning for you, and take you on a journey to explore cuisines!

The Vegan Plan vision is to create a world-wide community of compassionate people who care about their health, the welfare of animals, and the sustainability of our planet.

 

Why We Need Your Help

We’re so close to our launch and want to make sure our product is flawless...that means raising a few more funds to enable us to make final, significant design improvements to what we’ve already built:

We want membership to be intuitive and allow for more customisation, including automatically removing and replacing foods for people who struggle with allergies, food sensitivities (or even just ingredients you don't like). Your support will also validate our efforts and inspire us to push as hard as we can to encourage people to try a vegan diet.

Our stretch goal of £15,000 will enable us to build and launch custom iOS and Android apps, making following Vegan Plan even more mobile friendly.

With your support, we will be able to share amazing meals and help more people choose to change their lives and better our world, one meal at a time. 

 

What You Get

When you support us through Indiegogo you’ll be able to enjoy great discounts on subscriptions and loads more perks: 

All backers receive our Vegan Starter Kit containing a guide to eating vegan, a 4 week vegan meal plan and 25 easy & delicious recipes.

Our full list of perks are:

£5: Vegan Food Lover: Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£10 Tapas Plate: 2 month subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£25: Take Me to the Vegan Buffet: 6 month subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£45: All You Can Eat: 12 month subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£95: Vegan for Life: Lifetime subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£200: Budding Chef: 60 minute online cooking class + Lifetime subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£300: Biceps and Broccoli: 1-on-1 health consultation, Lifetime subscription + Vegan Meal Plan Starter Kit

£950: Yogalicious: Luxury 4 day Vegan Food and Yoga Retreat in Sri Lanka + 5 Lifetime subscriptions + All Other Perks

10% of all membership go to "Ceylon Paws" supporting street dogs in Sri Lanka.

Sri Lanka has 3 million street dogs! The Government in Sri Lanka changed the law so stray dogs cannot be put down. They also changed the status of stray dogs to ‘community dogs’, encouraging people to feed and support them. The challenge is Sri Lanka is still a developing country and people don't have enough money to feed these dogs. So that's where a charity like Ceylon Paws comes in.

These dogs need support: food, basic vaccinations and sometimes professional veterinary care. By subscribing to Vegan Plan you help them too!

 

The impact

When you support our campaign, you are supporting our values:

- To connect, inspire, and educate a worldwide community about healthy vegan food.
- To protect and support the lives of animals. 
- To make a personal statement about our care for the planet.

When you eat more plants, you become healthier, our planet becomes healthier and it’s better for our animal friends too. 

Your Vegan Plan subscription will help you:
- Save up to 3 hours per week on recipe planning
- Reduce waste by 40% as you'll get a grocery list tailored to your household needs
- Save money by avoiding impulse buying at the store with your shopping list
- Discover new cuisines, dishes and flavours every week
- Eat vegan & healthy every week

 

Risks & Challenges

The Vegan community loves the challenge of introducing more people to a more meaningful way of eating. That said, the project does have some risks:

The software itself presents the challenge of customisation: we want to make each user's experience unique. This creates additional complexity that we must work through to ensure a strong product.

Vegan Plan has been built as a desktop application. With more and more people ‘going mobile,’ iOS and Android mobile applications are high on our agenda to create and we have incorporated them into our stretch goals. A native mobile experience that members can use in the palm of their hands will make weekly shopping and meal planning even easier.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We really appreciate your support even if you can't contribute. Share this campaign with friends and family using Indiegogo share tools below. Help us spread the word and help more people stay healthy and eat vegan!

story:
PLAATO® KEG - The All-In-One Brewing Scale 

 

PROJECT UPDATE
PLAATO Keg is in production, and over 4000pcs is in used all over the world. We are currently on our third production batch.

 

(1) KEG MONITORING

  • Level of beer inside the keg
  • Real-time Pouring Status  
  • Temperature

 

(2) BREWING SCALE

  • Accurately weigh ingredients or water up to 132lb/60kg 
  • Closed Transfer - Measure when the keg is full

 

(3) CO2 MONITORING

  • Remaining CO2-level in the bottle
  • Avoid CO2-leaks

 

 

 

Know How Much You Have

The new Plaato Keg knows exactly how much beer is left in all of your kegs. Highly accurate load-cells keeps track of the good stuff, and yes the beer’s gravity is included in the calculations. 

 

See How Much You Pour

Plaato Keg shows you pouring in real-time, and notifies you whenever a beer is being poured from your keg. 

 

Get Notified If Your Thermostat Goes Wild

With the built-in temperature sensor and WiFi-connection, you can remotely monitor your kegerator. By enabling push-notifications, you will get notified is something is wrong, eg. an opened door or a thermostat running wild. 

 

Share Access To Your Inventory

Keep your friends included and grant them access to your account, so they can remind you to run another batch when you’re running low.

 

 

 

Unlocked 
ALL PLAATO KEG DEVICES Will Get A Built-in Leak-detection Feature.

 

Get notification in the app if liquid is detected. Plaato Keg is internet-connected, so you will get the notification wherever you are. 

 

Once you start kegging, there’s no way back. We know the drill. Starting out happy with a single keg, then suddenly finding yourself with seven kegs. That is why we designed Plaato Keg to be easy to install.

  • 1. Transfer beer
  • 2. Connect device
  • 3. Ready to tap

 

 

PLAATO Keg uses three synchronized, high-quality load-cells that measures the keg-weight every 0.1 second, sending real-time data of your kegs directly to your smartphone using WiFi.

 

 

Product Anatomy

  • Impact resistant polycarbonate body
  • Withstand even the roughest environments

 

 

Technology Comparisons

There are two leading technologies used to monitor beer kegs; Load Cells and Flow-meters. As beer brewers, we found this to be an easy choice. 

Don’t get fooled by the sleek design. The PLAATO Keg is small, but it’s ready for big kegs full of beer. High performance materials combined with thought through solutions makes it durable, waterproof and ready to handle kegs up to 13 US gallons / 50L.

 

Fits 99% of all kegs 

 

 

Waterproofed  

 

 

100% NON-Invasive - No cleaning - No maintenance 

 

Easy setup 

 

Batch-specific details, real-time measurements and kegerator dashboard.

 

 

The free PLAATO-app lets you have all your kegs in the same place. Each keg has its own dashboard, letting you type in batch-specific data, including:

  • Last Pour Size
  • Batch name
  • Kegging date
  • OG & FG
  • The built-in calculator automatically calculates the ABV%
  • Real-Time Tap Status

The app automatically calculates the volume of beer in the keg based on the Final Gravity, and you can choose between Metric or US Customary units.

 

Connect all your kegs

Add unlimited number of kegs in the same account.  

 

 

Industry-standard accuracy 

High-quality, full-bridge load-cells makes the PLAATO Keg highly accurate, even on the smallest pours (and on the bigger ones).

 

Check out the feedback from our beta-users.

 

 

Technical specifications, Materials & Performance

PLAATO® KEG is developed with feedback from over 350 ambassadors enrolled in the PLAATO Test User Program. This ensures a device that fits 99% of the most used kegs out there, including:

  • All types of Corny Kegs
  • Key-Kegs
  • Torpedo Kegs
  • Sankey Kegs

 

Enable CO2-mode & monitor the CO2-bottle

It came to us while in development. If we can measure the real-time level of beer, then we can do the same thing with CO2! 

Presenting you the CO2-version of the PLAATO Keg.
Enable CO2-mode in the Plaato-app, and turn one of your keg-devices into your CO2-bottle monitor, checking the remaining level of gas in real-time. 

Use it to have control over the remaining level of CO2 to make sure you have enough for the upcoming brew-day, or use it to detect a CO2-leak from a connector.

CO2-bottles loses mass as the CO2 is used by carbonation, tapping or leaks. This means that by placing the CO2- bottle on top of our "PLAATO Keg", you will get precise estimates of the remaining level of CO2. This feature can also be used to detect leaks.

Most CO2-bottles fit directly onto the Plaato Keg, providing you the tool to never be unawarely out of CO2 again

 

EARLY BIRD REWARDS

 

 

Comparing the vitals of the PLAATO Keg with the other solutions out there, and it'll make a clear picture 

 

We believe in an open community where hardware and software are unified. That is why we already now has started working on the API that lets you connect your PLAATO Keg to best brewing software out there: Brewfather.

We have tried, tested and redesigned the PLAATO Keg more times than we want to admit. Our end goal has always been to make a product that we can all stand behind.

 

Located in Oslo, Norway, we do all development and design from our lab.

  • Paal Ingebrigtsen, Co-founder and CEO
  • Michael Kononsky, Co-founder and Lead Designer
  • Tarje Sandvik, Embedded Systems Engineer
  • Tobias Hartvedt Knudsen, Developer
  • Martin Blæsbjerg-Christiansen, Logistics & Customer Support

 

Thanks to everyone that got our first campaign successfully funded. Now over 6000 airlocks is bubbling away in over 60 countries!

The PLAATO Airlock won the Red Dot Award 2018. Check it out here. 

 

Follow us on Instagram!

PLAATO Keg can be used in many more ways that just for kegs. It is a versatile platform that helps you throughout the brewing process.

 

Use it to measure grains and ingredients - up to 130lbs / 60kg

 

Closed transfer - Get full control and know when your keg is full during oxygen-free transfer

 

Do you have an outdoors kitchen?

Use the PLAATO Keg to monitor the propan-tank remotely
